word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν δαυιδ πρὸς κύριον ἐν τῷ ἰδεῖν αὐτὸν τὸν ἄγγελον τύπτοντα ἐν τῷ λαῷ καὶ εἶπεν ἰδοὺ ἐγώ εἰμι ἠδίκησα καὶ ἐγώ εἰμι ὁ ποιμὴν ἐκακοποίησα καὶ οὗτοι τὰ πρόβατα τί ἐποίησαν γενέσθω δὴ ἡ χείρ σου ἐν ἐμοὶ καὶ ἐν τῷ οἴκῳ τοῦ πατρός μου

word.kjv: He said unto him, I am a prophet also as thou art; and an angel spake unto me by the word of the LORD, saying, Bring him back with thee into thine house, that he may eat bread and drink water. But he lied unto him.
word.thailand: และเขาจึงพูดกับท่านว่า "ข้าพเจ้าก็เป็นผู้พยากรณ์อย่างที่ท่านเป็นนั้นด้วย มีทูตสวรรค์องค์หนึ่งมาบอกข้าพเจ้าโดยพระวจนะของพระเยโฮวาห์ว่า `จงนำเขากลับมากับเจ้ายังเรือนของเจ้า เพื่อเขาจะได้รับประทานอาหารและดื่มน้ำ'" แต่เขามุสาต่อท่าน
word.spanish1909: Y el otro le dijo: Yo también soy profeta como tú, y un ángel me ha hablado por palabra de Jehová, diciendo: Vuélvele contigo á tu casa, para que coma pan y beba agua. Empero mintióle.
word.latinvulgate: Qui ait illi : Et ego propheta sum similis tui : et angelus locutus est mihi in sermone Domini, dicens : Reduc eum tecum in domum tuam, ut comedat panem, et bibat aquam. Fefellit eum,
word.italian1927: L’altro gli disse: "Anch’io son profeta come sei tu; e un angelo mi ha parlato per ordine dell’Eterno, dicendo: Rimenalo teco in casa tua, affinché mangi del pane e beva dell’acqua". Costui gli mentiva.
word.german1912: Er sprach zu ihm: Ich bin auch ein Prophet wie du, und ein Engel hat mit mir geredet durch des HERRN Wort und gesagt: Führe ihn wieder mit dir heim, daß er Brot esse und Wasser trinke. Er log ihm aber
word.french1910: Et il lui dit: Moi aussi, je suis prophète comme toi; et un ange m'a parlé de la part de l'Eternel, et m'a dit: Ramène-le avec toi dans ta maison, et qu'il mange du pain et boive de l'eau. Il lui mentait.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 老先知對他說：“我是先知，和你一樣。有一位天使奉耶和華的命令告訴我說：‘你去帶他與你一起回家，給他吃飯喝水。’”但是，老先知是欺騙他的。
word.korean: 저가 그 사람에게 이르되 `나도 그대와 같은 선지자라 천사가 여호와의 말씀으로 내게 이르기를 그를 네 집으로 데리고 돌아가서 그에게 떡을 먹이고 물을 마시우라 하였느니라' 하니 이는 그 사람을 속임이라
word.tagalog: At sinabi niya sa kaniya, Ako man ay propeta na gaya mo; at isang anghel ay nagsalita sa akin sa pamamagitan ng salita ng Panginoon, na nagsasabi, Ibalik mo siya na kasama mo sa iyong bahay, upang siya'y makakain ng tinapay at makainom ng tubig. Nguni't siya'y nagbulaan sa kaniya.
word.maori: Na ka mea tera ki a ia, He poropiti ano ahau, he pena me koe; kua korerotia mai ano ki ahau te kupu a Ihowa e tetahi anahera: i ki mai ia, Whakahokia ia ki a koe, ki tou whare ki te kai taro mana, ki te inu wai. He teka ia nana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Ug siya miingon kaniya: Ako usab usa man ka manalagna ingon kanimo; ug usa ka manolonda namulong kanako sa pulong ni Jehova, nga nagaingon: Dad-a siya pagbalik uban kanimo ngadto sa imong balay, aron siya makakaon sa tinapay ug makainum sa tubig. Apan siya nagbakak kaniya.
word.hebrew: יח ויאמר לו גם אני נביא כמוך ומלאך דבר אלי בדבר יהוה לאמר השבהו אתך אל ביתך ויאכל לחם וישת מים כחש לו
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר לו גם אני נביא כמוך ומלאך דבר אלי בדבר יהוה לאמר השבהו אתך אל ביתך ויאכל לחם וישת מים כחש לו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν πρὸς αὐτόν κἀγὼ προφήτης εἰμὶ καθὼς σύ καὶ ἄγγελος λελάληκεν πρός με ἐν ῥήματι κυρίου λέγων ἐπίστρεψον αὐτὸν πρὸς σεαυτὸν εἰς τὸν οἶκόν σου καὶ φαγέτω ἄρτον καὶ πιέτω ὕδωρ καὶ ἐψεύσατο αὐτῷ

word.kjv: And as he lay and slept under a juniper tree, behold, then an angel touched him, and said unto him, Arise and eat.
word.thailand: และท่านก็นอนลงหลับอยู่ใต้ต้นซาก ดูเถิด มีทูตสวรรค์องค์หนึ่งมาถูกต้องท่าน และพูดกับท่านว่า "ลุกขึ้นรับประทานซี"
word.spanish1909: Y echándose debajo del enebro, quedóse dormido: y he aquí luego un ángel que le tocó, y le dijo: Levántate, come.
word.latinvulgate: Projecitque se, et obdormivit in umbra juniperi : et ecce angelus Domini tetigit eum, et dixit illi : Surge, et comede.
word.italian1927: Poi si coricò, e si addormentò sotto la ginestra; quand’ecco che un angelo lo toccò, e gli disse: "Alzati e mangia".
word.german1912: Und er legte sich und schlief unter dem Wacholder. Und siehe, ein Engel rührte ihn an und sprach zu ihm: Steh auf und iß!
word.french1910: Il se coucha et s'endormit sous un genêt. Et voici, un ange le toucha, et lui dit: Lève-toi, mange.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他躺在那棵羅騰樹下，睡著了。忽然有一位天使拍他，說：“起來，吃吧！”
word.korean: 로뎀나무 아래 누워 자더니 천사가 어루만지며 이르되 일어나서 먹으라 하는지라
word.tagalog: At siya'y nahiga at natulog sa ilalim ng punong kahoy na enebro; at, narito, kinalabit siya ng isang anghel, at sinabi sa kaniya, Ikaw ay gumising at kumain.
word.maori: Na ka takoto ia, ka moe i raro i tetahi hunipa; na, ko tetahi anahera e papaki ana i a ia, e mea ana ki a ia, Maranga ki te kai.
word.cebuano: Ug siya mihigda ug natulog sa ilalum sa usa ka kahoy nga enebro; ug, ania karon, usa ka manolonda mikablit kaniya, ug miingon kaniya: Tumindog ka ug kumaon.
word.hebrew: ה וישכב ויישן תחת רתם אחד והנה זה מלאך נגע בו ויאמר לו קום אכול
word.hebrewmodern: וישכב ויישן תחת רתם אחד והנה זה מלאך נגע בו ויאמר לו קום אכול׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐκοιμήθη καὶ ὕπνωσεν ἐκεῖ ὑπὸ φυτόν καὶ ἰδού τις ἥψατο αὐτοῦ καὶ εἶπεν αὐτῷ ἀνάστηθι καὶ φάγε

word.kjv: And the angel of the LORD came again the second time, and touched him, and said, Arise and eat; because the journey is too great for thee.
word.thailand: และทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ก็มาอีกเป็นครั้งที่สอง ถูกต้องท่านแล้วว่า "ลุกขึ้นรับประทานซี เพราะว่าทางเดินนั้นเกินกำลังของท่าน"
word.spanish1909: Y volviendo el ángel de Jehová la segunda vez, tocóle, diciendo: Levántate, come: porque gran camino te resta.
word.latinvulgate: Reversusque est angelus Domini secundo, et tetigit eum, dixitque illi : Surge, comede : grandis enim tibi restat via.
word.italian1927: E l’angelo dell’Eterno tornò la seconda volta, lo toccò, e disse: "Alzati e mangia, poiché il cammino è troppo lungo per te".
word.german1912: Und der Engel des HERRN kam zum andernmal wieder und rührte ihn an und sprach: Steh auf und iß! denn du hast einen großen Weg vor dir.
word.french1910: L'ange de l'Eternel vint une seconde fois, le toucha, et dit: Lève-toi, mange, car le chemin est trop long pour toi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的使者第二次回來拍他，說：“起來吃吧！因為你要走的路程太遠了。”
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 또 다시 와서 어루만지며 이르되 일어나서 먹으라 네가 길을 이기지 못할까 하노라 하는지라
word.tagalog: At ang anghel ng Panginoon ay nagbalik na ikalawa, at kinalabit siya, at sinabi, Ikaw ay bumangon at kumain; sapagka't ang paglalakbay ay totoong malayo sa ganang iyo.
word.maori: Na ka hoki mai ano te anahera a Ihowa, a ka papaki i a ia, ka mea, Maranga ki te kai; he roa rawa hoki te ara mou, e kore e taea e koe.
word.cebuano: Ug ang manolonda ni Jehova mianha pag-usab sa ikaduha, ug gikablit siya, ug miingon: Tumindog ka ug kumaon, tungod kay ang panaw halayo ra kaayo alang kanimo.
word.hebrew: ז וישב מלאך יהוה שנית ויגע בו ויאמר קום אכל  כי רב ממך הדרך
word.hebrewmodern: וישב מלאך יהוה שנית ויגע בו ויאמר קום אכל כי רב ממך הדרך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπέστρεψεν ὁ ἄγγελος κυρίου ἐκ δευτέρου καὶ ἥψατο αὐτοῦ καὶ εἶπεν αὐτῷ ἀνάστα φάγε ὅτι πολλὴ ἀπὸ σοῦ ἡ ὁδός

word.kjv: But the angel of the LORD said to Elijah the Tishbite, Arise, go up to meet the messengers of the king of Samaria, and say unto them, Is it not because there is not a God in Israel, that ye go to inquire of Baal-zebub the god of Ekron?
word.thailand: แต่ทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์พูดกับเอลียาห์ชาวทิชบีว่า "จงลุกขึ้นไปพบบรรดาผู้สื่อสารของกษัตริย์แห่งสะมาเรีย และจงพูดกับเขาทั้งหลายว่า `เพราะไม่มีพระเจ้าในอิสราเอลแล้วหรือ ท่านจึงไปถามบาอัลเซบูบ พระแห่งเอโครน'
word.spanish1909: Entonces el ángel de Jehová habló á Elías Thisbita, diciendo: Levántate, y sube á encontrarte con los mensajeros del rey de Samaria, y les dirás: ¿No hay Dios en Israel, que vosotros vais á consultar á Baal-zebub dios de Ecrón?
word.latinvulgate: Angelus autem Domini locutus est ad Eliam Thesbiten, dicens : Surge, et ascende in occursum nuntiorum regis Samariæ, et dices ad eos : Numquid non est Deus in Israël, ut eatis ad consulendum Beelzebub deum Accaron ?
word.italian1927: Ma un angelo dell’Eterno disse ad Elia il Tishbita: "Lèvati, sali incontro ai messi del re di Samaria, e di’ loro: E’ forse perché non v’è Dio in Israele che voi andate a consultare Baal-Zebub, dio di Ekron?
word.german1912: Aber der Engel des HERRN redete mit Elia, dem Thisbiter: Auf! und begegne den Boten des Königs zu Samaria und sprich zu ihnen: Ist denn nun kein Gott in Israel, daß ihr hingehet, zu fragen Baal-Sebub, den Gott Ekrons?
word.french1910: Mais l'ange de l'Eternel dit à Elie, le Thischbite: Lève-toi, monte à la rencontre des messagers du roi de Samarie, et dis-leur: Est-ce parce qu'il n'y a point de Dieu en Israël que vous allez consulter Baal-Zebub, dieu d'Ekron?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但耶和華的使者對提斯比人以利亞說：“你動身上去迎著撒瑪利亞王的使者，對他們說：‘你們去求問以革倫的神巴力．西卜，是因為以色列中沒有　神嗎？
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 디셉 사람 엘리야에게 이르시되 `너는 일어나 올라가서 사마리아 왕의 사자를 만나서 저에게 이르기를 이스라엘에 하나님이 없어서 너희가 에그론의 신 바알세붑에게 물으러 가느냐
word.tagalog: Nguni't sinabi ng anghel ng Panginoon kay Elias na Thisbita, Ikaw ay bumangon, umahon ka na salubungin mo ang mga sugo ng hari ng Samaria, at sabihin mo sa kanila, Dahil ba sa walang Dios sa Israel, na kaya kayo'y nagsisiyaon upang magsipagusisa kay Baal-zebub na dios sa Ecron?
word.maori: Otiia i mea te anahera a Ihowa ki a Iraia Tihipi, Whakatika, haere ki runga, ki te whakatau i nga tangata a te kingi o Hamaria, mea atu ki a ratou, He kore Atua ianei no Iharaira i haere ai koutou ki te ui ki a Paarahepupa atua o Ekerono?
word.cebuano: Apan ang manolonda ni Jehova miingon kang Elias ang Tisbinhon: Tumindog ka, tumungas ka aron hibalagon mo ang mga sinugo sa hari sa Samaria, ug ingna sila: Tungod ba kay walay Dios diha sa Israel, maoy hinungdan nga kamo moadto sa pagpangutana kang Baal-zebub, ang dios sa Ecron?
word.hebrew: ג ומלאך יהוה דבר אל אליה התשבי קום עלה לקראת מלאכי מלך שמרון ודבר אלהם--המבלי אין אלהים בישראל אתם הלכים לדרש בבעל זבוב אלהי עקרון
word.hebrewmodern: ומלאך יהוה דבר אל אליה התשבי קום עלה לקראת מלאכי מלך שמרון ודבר אלהם המבלי אין אלהים בישראל אתם הלכים לדרש בבעל זבוב אלהי עקרון׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἄγγελος κυρίου ἐλάλησεν πρὸς ηλιου τὸν θεσβίτην λέγων ἀναστὰς δεῦρο εἰς συνάντησιν τῶν ἀγγέλων οχοζιου βασιλέως σαμαρείας καὶ λαλήσεις πρὸς αὐτούς εἰ παρὰ τὸ μὴ εἶναι θεὸν ἐν ισραηλ ὑμεῖς πορεύεσθε ἐπιζητῆσαι ἐν τῇ βααλ μυῖαν θεὸν ακκαρων

word.kjv: And the angel of the LORD said unto Elijah, Go down with him: be not afraid of him. And he arose, and went down with him unto the king.
word.thailand: แล้วทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์กล่าวแก่เอลียาห์ว่า "จงลงไปกับเขาเถิด อย่ากลัวเขาเลย" ท่านก็ลุกขึ้นลงไปกับเขาเข้าเฝ้ากษัตริย์
word.spanish1909: Entonces el ángel de Jehová dijo á Elías: Desciende con él; no hayas de él miedo. Y él se levantó, y descendió con él al rey.
word.latinvulgate: Locutus est autem angelus Domini ad Eliam, dicens : Descende cum eo, ne timeas. Surrexit igitur, et descendit cum eo ad regem,
word.italian1927: E l’angelo dell’Eterno disse ad Elia: "Scendi con lui; non aver timore di lui". Elia dunque si levò, scese col capitano, andò dal re, e gli disse:
word.german1912: Da sprach der Engel des HERRN zu Elia: Gehe mit ihm hinab und fürchte dich nicht vor ihm! und er machte sich auf und ging mit ihm hinab zum König.
word.french1910: L'ange de l'Eternel dit à Elie: Descends avec lui, n'aie aucune crainte de lui. Elie se leva et descendit avec lui vers le roi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的使者對以利亞說：“你和他下去吧，不要怕他。”於是以利亞起來，和他下山到王那裡去了。
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 엘리야에게 이르되 `너는 저를 두려워 말고 함께 내려가라' 하신지라 엘리야가 곧 일어나 저와 함께 내려와서 왕에게 이르러
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng anghel ng Panginoon kay Elias, Bumaba kang kasama niya: huwag kang matakot sa kaniya. At siya'y tumindig, at bumabang kasama niya hanggang sa hari.
word.maori: Na ka mea te anahera a Ihowa ki a Iraia, Heke atu korua, kaua e wehi i a ia. Na whakatika ana ia, heke tahi ana raua ki te kingi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang manolonda ni Jehova miingon kang Elias: Lumugsong ka uban kaniya: ayaw kahadlok kaniya. Ug siya mitindog, ug milugsong uban kaniya ngadto sa hari.
word.hebrew: טו וידבר מלאך יהוה אל אליהו רד אותו אל תירא מפניו ויקם וירד אותו אל המלך
word.hebrewmodern: וידבר מלאך יהוה אל אליהו רד אותו אל תירא מפניו ויקם וירד אותו אל המלך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐλάλησεν ἄγγελος κυρίου πρὸς ηλιου καὶ εἶπεν κατάβηθι μετ' αὐτοῦ μὴ φοβηθῇς ἀπὸ προσώπου αὐτῶν καὶ ἀνέστη ηλιου καὶ κατέβη μετ' αὐτοῦ πρὸς τὸν βασιλέα

word.kjv: And it came to pass that night, that the angel of the LORD went out, and smote in the camp of the Assyrians an hundred fourscore and five thousand: and when they arose early in the morning, behold, they were all dead corpses.
word.thailand: และอยู่มาในคืนนั้นทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ได้ออกไป และได้ประหารคนในค่ายแห่งคนอัสซีเรียเสียหนึ่งแสนแปดหมื่นห้าพันคน และเมื่อคนลุกขึ้นในเวลาเช้ามืด ดูเถิด พวกเหล่านั้นเป็นศพทั้งนั้น
word.spanish1909: Y aconteció que la misma noche salió el ángel de Jehová, é hirió en el campo de los Asirios ciento ochenta y cinco mil; y como se levantaron por la mañana, he aquí los cuerpos de los muertos.
word.latinvulgate: Factum est igitur in nocte illa, venit angelus Domini, et percussit in castris Assyriorum centum octoginta quinque millia. Cumque diluculo surrexisset, vidit omnia corpora mortuorum : et recedens abiit,
word.italian1927: E quella stessa notte avvenne che l’angelo dell’Eterno uscì e colpì nel campo degli Assiri cent’ottantacinquemila uomini; e quando la gente si levò la mattina, ecco, eran tutti cadaveri.
word.german1912: Und in derselben Nacht fuhr aus der Engel des HERRN und schlug im Lager von Assyrien hundertfünfundachtzigtausend Mann. Und da sie sich des Morgens früh aufmachten, siehe, da lag's alles eitel tote Leichname.
word.french1910: Cette nuit-là, l'ange de l'Eternel sortit, et frappa dans le camp des Assyriens cent quatre-vingt-cinq mille hommes. Et quand on se leva le matin, voici, c'étaient tous des corps morts.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神懲罰亞述王（代下32:20~21；賽37:36~38）那天晚上，耶和華的使者出去，在亞述軍營殺了十八萬五千人。早上，他們起來的時候，看哪，到處都是死屍。
word.korean: 이 밤에 여호와의 사자가 나와서 앗수르 진에서 군사 십 팔만 오천을 친지라 아침에 일찌기 일어나 보니 다 송장이 되었더라
word.tagalog: At nangyari, nang gabing yaon, na ang anghel ng Panginoon ay lumabas, at nanakit sa kampamento ng mga taga Asiria ng isang daan at walong pu't limang libo: at nang ang mga tao ay magsibangong maaga sa kinaumagahan, narito, silang lahat ay mga bangkay.
word.maori: ¶ Na i taua po ka puta te anahera a Ihowa, a patua iho e ia i te puni o nga Ahiriana kotahi rau e waru tekau ma rima mano: a, i te marangatanga ake i te ata, nana, o ratou tinana! he tupapaku katoa ratou.
word.cebuano: Ug nahitabo niadtong gabhiona nga ang manolonda ni Jehova migula, ug gipamatay sa campo sa mga Asirianhon ang usa ka gatus ug kawaloan ug lima ka libo, ug sa pagbangon sa mga tawo sayo sa pagkabuntag: ania karon, kining tanan mga minatay.
word.hebrew: לה ויהי בלילה ההוא ויצא מלאך יהוה ויך במחנה אשור מאה שמונים וחמשה אלף וישכימו בבקר והנה כלם פגרים מתים
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי בלילה ההוא ויצא מלאך יהוה ויך במחנה אשור מאה שמונים וחמשה אלף וישכימו בבקר והנה כלם פגרים מתים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐγένετο ἕως νυκτὸς καὶ ἐξῆλθεν ἄγγελος κυρίου καὶ ἐπάταξεν ἐν τῇ παρεμβολῇ τῶν ἀσσυρίων ἑκατὸν ὀγδοήκοντα πέντε χιλιάδας καὶ ὤρθρισαν τὸ πρωί καὶ ἰδοὺ πάντες σώματα νεκρά

word.kjv: Either three years' famine; or three months to be destroyed before thy foes, while that the sword of thine enemies overtaketh thee; or else three days the sword of the LORD, even the pestilence, in the land, and the angel of the LORD destroying throughout all the coasts of Israel. Now therefore advise thyself what word I shall bring again to him that sent me.
word.thailand: คือ กันดารอาหารสามปี หรือการล้างผลาญโดยศัตรูของเจ้าสามเดือนขณะที่ดาบของศัตรูจะขับเจ้าทัน หรือดาบของพระเยโฮวาห์สามวันคือโรคระบาดบนแผ่นดิน และทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ทำลายทั่วไปในดินแดนทั้งสิ้นของอิสราเอล บัดนี้ขอทรงพิจารณาดูว่าจะให้ข้าพระองค์กราบทูลพระองค์ผู้ทรงใช้ข้าพระองค์มาว่าประการใด"
word.spanish1909: Escógete, ó tres años de hambre; ó ser por tres meses deshecho delante de tus enemigos, y que la espada de tus adversarios te alcance; ó por tres días la espada de Jehová y pestilencia en la tierra, y que el ángel de Jehová destruya en todo el término de
word.latinvulgate: aut tribus annis famem ; aut tribus mensibus te fugere hostes tuos, et gladium eorum non posse evadere ; aut tribus diebus gladium Domini, et pestilentiam versari in terra, et angleum Domini interficere in universis finibus Israël : nunc igitur vide quid respondeam ei, qui misit me.
word.italian1927: o tre anni di carestia, o tre mesi durante i quali i tuoi avversari facciano scempio di te e ti raggiunga la spada dei tuoi nemici, ovvero tre giorni di spada dell’Eterno, ossia di peste nel paese, durante i quali l’angelo dell’Eterno porterà la distruzione in tutto il territorio d’Israele. Or dunque vedi che cosa io debba rispondere a colui che mi ha mandato".
word.german1912: entweder drei Jahre Teuerung, oder drei Monate Flucht vor deinen Widersachern und vor dem Schwert deiner Feinde, daß dich's ergreife, oder drei Tage das Schwert des HERRN und Pestilenz im Lande, daß der Engel des HERRN verderbe in allen Grenzen Israels. So siehe nun zu, was ich antworten soll dem, der mich gesandt hat.
word.french1910: ou trois années de famine, ou trois mois pendant lesquels tu seras détruit par tes adversaires et atteint par l'épée de tes ennemis, ou trois jours pendant lesquels l'épée de l'Eternel et la peste seront dans le pays et l'ange de l'Eternel portera la destruction dans tout le territoire d'Israël. Vois maintenant ce que je dois répondre à celui qui m'envoie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 或是三年的饑荒；或是在你敵人面前逃亡，被你仇敵的刀劍追殺三個月；或是耶和華的刀攻擊三天，就是在國中發生瘟疫三日，耶和華的使者在以色列的四境施行毀滅。’現在你考慮一下，我該用甚麼話回覆那差派我來的。”
word.korean: 혹, 삼년 기근일지 혹, 네가 석달을 대적에게 패하여 대적의 칼에 쫓길 일일지, 혹 여호와의 칼 곧 온역이 사흘동안 이 땅에 유행하며 여호와의 사자가 이스라엘 온 지경을 멸할 일일지 하셨나니 내가 무슨 말로 나를 보내신 이에게 대답할 것을 결정하소서
word.tagalog: Tatlong taong kagutom; o tatlong buwan na pagkalipol sa harap ng iyong mga kaaway, samantalang ang tabak ng iyong mga kaaway ay umabot sa iyo; o kung dili ay tatlong araw na ang tabak ng Panginoon, sa makatuwid baga'y ang salot sa lupain, at ang anghel ng Panginoon ay mangwawasak sa lahat na hangganan ng Israel. Ngayon nga'y akalain mo kung anong sagot ang ibabalik ko sa kaniya na nagsugo sa akin.
word.maori: Kia toru ranei nga tau matekai; kia toru ranei nga marama e whakangaromia ai koe i te aroaro o ou hoariri, me te hoari a ou hoa whawhai e hopu ana i a koe? kia toru ranei nga ra o te hoari a Ihowa, ara o te mate uruta ki te whenua, me te anahera a Ihowa e whakangaro ana, i nga rohe katoa o Iharaira. Na whakaaroa te kupu e whakahokia e ahau ki toku kaitono mai.
word.cebuano: Tolo ba ka tuig nga gutom; kun tolo ba ka bulan nga pagaut-uton ka sa atubangan sa imong mga kaaway, samtang nga ang pinuti sa imong mga kaaway makaapas kanimo; kun tolo ba hinoon ka adlaw nga ang espada ni Jehova bisan kamatay sa yuta, ug ang manolonda ni Jehova, magalaglag sa tibook nga yuta sa mga utlanan sa Israel. Busa karon hunahunaa unsang tubaga ang akong dad-on ngadto kaniya nga nagpaanhi kanako.
word.hebrew: יב אם שלוש שנים רעב ואם שלשה חדשים נספה מפני צריך וחרב אויביך למשגת ואם שלשת ימים חרב יהוה ודבר בארץ ומלאך יהוה משחית בכל גבול ישראל  ועתה ראה מה אשיב את שלחי דבר  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: אם שלוש שנים רעב ואם שלשה חדשים נספה מפני צריך וחרב אויבך למשגת ואם שלשת ימים חרב יהוה ודבר בארץ ומלאך יהוה משחית בכל גבול ישראל ועתה ראה מה אשיב את שלחי דבר׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἢ τρία ἔτη λιμοῦ ἢ τρεῖς μῆνας φεύγειν σε ἐκ προσώπου ἐχθρῶν σου καὶ μάχαιραν ἐχθρῶν σου τοῦ ἐξολεθρεῦσαι ἢ τρεῖς ἡμέρας ῥομφαίαν κυρίου καὶ θάνατον ἐν τῇ γῇ καὶ ἄγγελος κυρίου ἐξολεθρεύων ἐν πάσῃ κληρονομίᾳ ισραηλ καὶ νῦν ἰδὲ τί ἀποκριθῶ τῷ ἀποστείλαντί με λόγον

word.kjv: And God sent an angel unto Jerusalem to destroy it: and as he was destroying, the LORD beheld, and he repented him of the evil, and said to the angel that destroyed, It is enough, stay now thine hand. And the angel of the LORD stood by the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite.
word.thailand: และพระเจ้าทรงใช้ทูตสวรรค์ไปยังเยรูซาเล็มเพื่อจะทำลายเสีย แต่เมื่อท่านจะลงมือทำลาย พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงทอดพระเนตร และพระองค์ทรงกลับพระทัยในเหตุร้ายนั้น และพระองค์ตรัสกับทูตสวรรค์ผู้ทำลายนั้นว่า "พอแล้ว ยับยั้งมือของเจ้าได้" ส่วนทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ก็กำลังยืนอยู่ที่ลานนวดข้าวของโอรนันคนเยบุส
word.spanish1909: Y envió Jehová el ángel á Jerusalem para destruirla: pero estando él destruyendo, miró Jehová, y arrepintióse de aquel mal,
word.latinvulgate: Misit quoque angelum in Jerusalem, ut percuteret eam : cumque percuteretur, vidit Dominus, et misertus est super magnitudine mali : et imperavit angelo, qui percutiebat : Sufficit, jam cesset manus tua. Porro angelus Domini stabat juxta aream Ornam Jebusæi.
word.italian1927: E Dio mandò un angelo a Gerusalemme per distruggerla; e come questi si disponeva a distruggerla, l’Eterno gettò su di lei lo sguardo, si pentì della calamità che avea inflitta, e disse all’angelo distruttore: "Basta; ritieni ora la tua mano!" Or l’angelo dell’Eterno si trovava presso l’aia di Ornan, il Gebuseo.
word.german1912: Und Gott sandte den Engel gen Jerusalem, sie zu verderben. Und im Verderben sah der HERR darein und reute ihn das Übel, und er sprach zum Engel, dem Verderber: Es ist genug; laß deine Hand ab! Der Engel aber des HERRN stand bei der Tenne Ornans, des Jebusiters.
word.french1910: Dieu envoya un ange à Jérusalem pour la détruire; et comme il la détruisait, l'Eternel regarda et se repentit de ce mal, et il dit à l'ange qui détruisait: Assez! Retire maintenant ta main. L'ange de l'Eternel se tenait près de l'aire d'Ornan, le Jébusien.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神差派一位使者到耶路撒冷去，要毀滅那城；正要施行毀滅的時候，耶和華看見了，就後悔所要降的這災，於是對施行毀滅的天使說：“夠了！住手吧！”那時，耶和華的使者正站在耶布斯人阿珥楠的禾場附近。
word.korean: 하나님이 예루살렘을 멸하러 사자를 보내셨더니 사자가 멸하려 할 때에 여호와께서 보시고 이 재앙 내림을 뉘우치사 멸하는 사자에게 이르시되 족하다 이제는 네 손을 거두라 하시니 때에 여호와의 사자가 여부스 사람 오르난의 타작 마당 곁에 선지라
word.tagalog: At ang Dios ay nagsugo ng isang anghel sa Jerusalem, upang gibain; at nang kaniyang lilipulin, ang Panginoo'y tumingin, at nagsisi siya tungkol sa kasamaan, at sinabi sa manglilipol na anghel, Siya na, ngayo'y itigil mo ang iyong kamay. At ang anghel ng Panginoon ay tumayo sa tabi ng giikan ni Ornan na Jebuseo.
word.maori: I tonoa ano e te Atua he anahera ki Hiruharama whakangaro ai; a ia a ia e mea ana ki te whakangaro, ka titiro a Ihowa, na ka puta ke to Ihowa whakaaro mo te kino, a ka mea ki te anahera whakangaro, Kua nui: kati tou ringa. Na tu ana te anahera a Ihowa i te patunga witi a Oronana Iepuhi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang Dios nagpadala ug usa ka manolonda sa Jerusalem sa paglaglag niini: ug sa buot na niyang laglagon, si Jehova nakasud-ong, ug gibasulan niya ang kadautan, ug miingon sa maglalaglag nga manolonda: Igo na kana; karon ihunong mo ang imong kamot. Ug ang manolonda ni Jehova nagatindog tupad sa giukan ni Ornan ang Jebusehanon.
word.hebrew: טו וישלח האלהים מלאך לירושלם להשחיתה וכהשחית ראה יהוה וינחם על הרעה ויאמר למלאך המשחית רב עתה הרף ידך ומלאך יהוה עמד עם גרן ארנן היבוסי  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: וישלח האלהים מלאך לירושלם להשחיתה וכהשחית ראה יהוה וינחם על הרעה ויאמר למלאך המשחית רב עתה הרף ידך ומלאך יהוה עמד עם גרן ארנן היבוסי׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπέστειλεν ὁ θεὸς ἄγγελον εἰς ιερουσαλημ τοῦ ἐξολεθρεῦσαι αὐτήν καὶ ὡς ἐξωλέθρευσεν εἶδεν κύριος καὶ μετεμελήθη ἐπὶ τῇ κακίᾳ καὶ εἶπεν τῷ ἀγγέλῳ τῷ ἐξολεθρεύοντι ἱκανούσθω σοι ἄνες τὴν χεῖρά σου καὶ ὁ ἄγγελος κυρίου ἑστὼς ἐν τῷ ἅλῳ ορνα τοῦ ιεβουσαίου

word.kjv: And David lifted up his eyes, and saw the angel of the LORD stand between the earth and the heaven, having a drawn sword in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem. Then David and the elders of Israel, who were clothed in sackcloth, fell upon their faces.
word.thailand: และดาวิดแหงนพระพักตร์ทรงเห็นทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ยืนระหว่างแผ่นดินโลกและฟ้าสวรรค์ และในมือถือดาบที่ชักออกเหนือเยรูซาเล็ม แล้วดาวิดและพวกผู้ใหญ่ของอิสราเอล ผู้ได้สวมผ้ากระสอบแล้ว ก็ซบหน้าลง
word.spanish1909: (H21-17) Y alzando David sus ojos, vió al ángel de Jehová, que estaba entre el cielo y la tierra, teniendo un espada desnuda en su mano, extendida contra Jerusalem. Entonces David y los ancianos se postraron sobre sus rostros, cubiertos de sacos.
word.latinvulgate: Levansque David oculos suos, vidit angelum Domini stantem inter cælum et terram, et evaginatum gladium in manu ejus, et versum contra Jerusalem : et ceciderunt tam ipse, quam majores natu, vestiti ciliciis, proni in terram.
word.italian1927: E Davide, alzando gli occhi, vide l’angelo dell’Eterno che stava fra terra e cielo, avendo in mano una spada sguainata, vòlta contro Gerusalemme. Allora Davide e gli anziani, coperti di sacchi, si gettarono con la faccia a terra.
word.german1912: Und David hob seine Augen auf und sah den Engel des HERRN stehen zwischen Himmel und Erde und sein bloßes Schwert in seiner Hand ausgereckt über Jerusalem. Da fielen David und die Ältesten, mit Säcken bedeckt, auf ihr Antlitz.
word.french1910: David leva les yeux, et vit l'ange de l'Eternel se tenant entre la terre et le ciel et ayant à la main son épée nue tournée contre Jérusalem. Alors David et les anciens, couverts de sacs, tombèrent sur leur visage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛舉目看見耶和華的使者站在天地中間，手裡拿著出了鞘的刀，指向耶路撒冷。大衛和眾長老都穿上麻布，臉伏於地。
word.korean: 다윗이 눈을 들어보매 여호와의 사자가 천지 사이에 섰고 칼을 빼어 손에 들고 예루살렘 편을 가리켰는지라 다윗이 장로들로 더불어 굵은 베를 입고 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드려
word.tagalog: At itinanaw ni David ang kaniyang mga mata, at nakita ang anghel ng Panginoon na nakatayo sa pagitan ng lupa at ng langit, na may hawak na tabak sa kaniyang kamay na nakaunat sa Jerusalem. Nang magkagayo'y si David at ang mga matanda, na nangakapanamit ng kayong magaspang ay nangagpatirapa.
word.maori: Na ka ara nga kanohi o Rawiri, ka kite i te anahera a Ihowa e tu ana i te takiwa o te whenua, o te rangi, me tana hoari, unu rawa, i tona ringa, e totoro ana ki runga i Hiruharama. Katahi ka tapapa a Rawiri ratou ko nga kaumatua, he kakahu tarat ara te hipoki.
word.cebuano: Ug giyahat ni David ang iyang mga mata, ug nakita ang manolonda ni Jehova nga nagatindog sa taliwala sa yuta ug sa langit, nga may usa ka inibut nga espada sa iyang kamot gibakyaw paingon sa Jerusalem. Unya si David ug ang mga anciano, nga nanagsul-ob sa panapton nga sako, mingyaub.
word.hebrew: טז וישא דויד את עיניו וירא את מלאך יהוה עמד בין הארץ ובין השמים וחרבו שלופה בידו נטויה על ירושלם ויפל דויד והזקנים מכסים בשקים על פניהם
word.hebrewmodern: וישא דויד את עיניו וירא את מלאך יהוה עמד בין הארץ ובין השמים וחרבו שלופה בידו נטויה על ירושלם ויפל דויד והזקנים מכסים בשקים על פניהם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπῆρεν δαυιδ τοὺς ὀφθαλμοὺς αὐτοῦ καὶ εἶδεν τὸν ἄγγελον κυρίου ἑστῶτα ἀνὰ μέσον τῆς γῆς καὶ ἀνὰ μέσον τοῦ οὐρανοῦ καὶ ἡ ῥομφαία αὐτοῦ ἐσπασμένη ἐν τῇ χειρὶ αὐτοῦ ἐκτεταμένη ἐπὶ ιερουσαλημ καὶ ἔπεσεν δαυιδ καὶ οἱ πρεσβύτεροι περιβεβλημένοι ἐν σάκκοις ἐπὶ πρόσωπον αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Then the angel of the LORD commanded Gad to say to David, that David should go up, and set up an altar unto the LORD in the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite.
word.thailand: แล้วทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ได้บัญชาให้กาดทูลดาวิดว่า ให้ดาวิดขึ้นไปสร้างแท่นบูชาถวายแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ที่ลานนวดข้าวของโอรนันคนเยบุส
word.spanish1909: (H21-19) Y el ángel de Jehová ordenó á Gad que dijese á David, que subiese y construyese un altar á Jehová en la era de Ornán Jebuseo.
word.latinvulgate: Angelus autem Domini præcepit Gad ut diceret Davidi ut ascenderet, exstrueretque altare Domino Deo in area Ornan Jebusæi.
word.italian1927: Allora l’angelo dell’Eterno ordinò a Gad di dire a Davide che salisse ad erigere un altare all’Eterno nell’aia di Ornan, il Gebuseo.
word.german1912: Und der Engel des HERRN sprach zu Gad, daß er David sollte sagen, daß David hinaufgehen und dem HERRN einen Altar aufrichten sollte in der Tenne Ornans, des Jebusiters.
word.french1910: L'ange de l'Eternel dit à Gad de parler à David, afin qu'il montât pour élever un autel à l'Eternel dans l'aire d'Ornan, le Jébusien.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛築壇獻祭（撒下24:18~25）耶和華的使者吩咐迦得去告訴大衛，叫他上去，在耶布斯人阿珥楠的禾場上，為耶和華築一座祭壇。
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 갓을 명하여 다윗에게 이르시기를 올라가서 여부스 사람 오르난의 타작 마당에서 여호와를 위하여 단을 쌓으라 하신지라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y inutusan ng anghel ng Panginoon si Gad upang sabihin kay David na siya'y sumampa, at magtayo ng isang dambana sa Panginoon sa giikan ni Ornan na Jebuseo.
word.maori: ¶ Katahi ka korero te anahera a Ihowa ki a Kara kia mea ia ki a Rawiri, kia haere a Rawiri ki runga, ki te whakaara i tetahi aata ki a Ihowa ki te patunga witi a Oronana Iepuhi.
word.cebuano: Unya ang manolonda ni Jehova nagsugo kang Gad sa pag-ingon kang David, nga si David motungas, ug magtukod sa usa ka halaran kang Jehova didto sa giukan ni Ornan ang Jebusehanon.
word.hebrew: יח ומלאך יהוה אמר אל גד לאמר לדויד  כי יעלה דויד להקים מזבח ליהוה בגרן ארנן היבסי
word.hebrewmodern: ומלאך יהוה אמר אל גד לאמר לדויד כי יעלה דויד להקים מזבח ליהוה בגרן ארנן היבסי׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἄγγελος κυρίου εἶπεν τῷ γαδ τοῦ εἰπεῖν πρὸς δαυιδ ἵνα ἀναβῇ τοῦ στῆσαι θυσιαστήριον τῷ κυρίῳ ἐν ἅλῳ ορνα τοῦ ιεβουσαίου

word.kjv: And Ornan turned back, and saw the angel; and his four sons with him hid themselves. Now Ornan was threshing wheat.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายโอรนันกำลังนวดข้าวสาลีอยู่ ท่านหันมาเห็นทูตสวรรค์ บุตรชายสี่คนของท่านที่อยู่กับท่านก็ซ่อนตัวเสีย
word.spanish1909: (H21-21) Y volviéndose Ornán vió el ángel; por lo que se escondieron cuatro hijos suyos que con él estaban. Y Ornán trillaba el trigo.
word.latinvulgate: Porro Ornan cum suspexisset, et vidisset angelum, quatuorque filii ejus cum eo, absconderunt se : nam eo tempore terebat in area triticum.
word.italian1927: Ornan, voltandosi, vide l’angelo; e i suoi quattro figliuoli ch’eran con lui si nascosero. Ornan stava battendo il grano.
word.german1912: Ornan aber, da er sich wandte und sah den Engel, und seine vier Söhne mit ihm, versteckten sie sich; denn Ornan drosch Weizen.
word.french1910: Ornan se retourna et vit l'ange, et ses quatre fils se cachèrent avec lui: il foulait alors du froment.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那時阿珥楠正在打麥子；阿珥楠轉過身來看見了天使，就和他的四個兒子一起躲藏起來。
word.korean: 때에 오르난이 밀을 타작하다가 돌이켜 천사를 보고 네 아들과 함께 숨었더니
word.tagalog: At si Ornan ay bumalik at nakita ang anghel; at ang kaniyang apat na anak na kasama niya ay nagsipagkubli. Si Ornan nga ay gumigiik ng trigo.
word.maori: Na ka tahuri ake a Oronana, ka kite i te anahera; a piri ana ia, ratou ko ana tama tokowha. Na i te patu witi a Oronana.
word.cebuano: Ug si Ornan milingi, ug nakakita sa manolonda; ug ang iyang upat ka anak nga lalake nga didto uban kaniya nanagtago sa ilang kaugalingon. Karon si Ornan nagagiuk sa trigo.
word.hebrew: כ וישב ארנן וירא את המלאך וארבעת בניו עמו מתחבאים וארנן דש חטים
word.hebrewmodern: וישב ארנן וירא את המלאך וארבעת בניו עמו מתחבאים וארנן דש חטים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπέστρεψεν ορνα καὶ εἶδεν τὸν βασιλέα καὶ τέσσαρες υἱοὶ αὐτοῦ μετ' αὐτοῦ μεθαχαβιν καὶ ορνα ἦν ἀλοῶν πυρούς

word.kjv: And the LORD commanded the angel; and he put up his sword again into the sheath thereof.
word.thailand: แล้วพระเยโฮวาห์ก็ทรงบัญชาทูตสวรรค์ และท่านก็เอาดาบใส่ฝักเสีย
word.spanish1909: (H21-28) Y como Jehová habló al ángel, él volvió su espada á la vaina.
word.latinvulgate: Præcepitque Dominus angelo : et convertit gladium suum in vaginam.
word.italian1927: Poi l’Eterno comandò all’angelo di rimettere la spada nel fodero.
word.german1912: Und der HERR sprach zum Engel, daß er sein Schwert in sein Scheide kehrte.
word.french1910: Alors l'Eternel parla à l'ange, qui remit son épée dans le fourreau.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華吩咐使者，他就收刀入鞘。
word.korean: 사자를 명하시매 저가 칼을 집에 꽂았더라
word.tagalog: At inutusan ng Panginoon ang anghel; at kaniyang isinuksok sa kaluban ang kaniyang tabak.
word.maori: Na ka korero a Ihowa ki te anahera, a whakahokia ana e ia tana hoari ki tona takotoranga.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova nagsugo sa manolonda; ug iyang gisakub pag-usab ang iyang espada sa sakuban niana.
word.hebrew: כז ויאמר יהוה למלאך וישב חרבו אל נדנה
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר יהוה למלאך וישב חרבו אל נדנה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν κύριος πρὸς τὸν ἄγγελον καὶ κατέθηκεν τὴν ῥομφαίαν εἰς τὸν κολεόν

word.kjv: But David could not go before it to inquire of God: for he was afraid because of the sword of the angel of the LORD.
word.thailand: แต่ดาวิดจะไปทูลถามพระเจ้าที่นั่นไม่ได้ เพราะพระองค์ทรงกลัวดาบของทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: (H21-31) Mas David no pudo ir allá á consultar á Dios, porque estaba espantado á causa de la espada del ángel de Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Et non prævaluit David ire ad altare ut ibi obsecraret Deum : nimio enim fuerat in timore perterritus, videns gladium angeli Domini.
word.italian1927: E Davide non poteva andare davanti a quell’altare a cercare Iddio, per lo spavento che gli avea cagionato la spada dell’angelo dell’Eterno.
word.german1912: David aber konnte nicht hingehen vor denselben, Gott zu suchen, so war er erschrocken vor dem Schwert des Engels des HERRN.
word.french1910: David ne pouvait pas aller devant cet autel pour chercher Dieu, parce que l'épée de l'ange de l'Eternel lui avait causé de l'épouvante.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 只是大衛不敢上去求問　神，因為懼怕耶和華使者的刀。 [ (I Chronicles 21:31) 於是大衛說：“這就是耶和華　神的殿，這就是給以色列人獻燔祭的壇。” ]
word.korean: 다윗이 여호와의 사자의 칼을 두려워하여 감히 그 앞에가서 하나님께 묻지 못함이라
word.tagalog: Nguni't si David ay hindi makaparoon sa harap niyaon upang magusisa sa Dios: sapagka't siya'y natakot dahil sa tabak ng anghel ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Kihai ia a Rawiri i ahei te haere ki mua o taua aata ki te rapu i ta te Atua; i wehi hoki ia i te hoari a te anahera a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Apan si David dili makaadto sa atubangan niana sa pagpangutana sa Dios; kay siya nahadlok tungod sa espada sa manolonda ni Jehova.
word.hebrew: ל ולא יכל דויד ללכת לפניו לדרש אלהים  כי נבעת--מפני חרב מלאך יהוה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: ולא יכל דויד ללכת לפניו לדרש אלהים כי נבעת מפני חרב מלאך יהוה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ οὐκ ἠδύνατο δαυιδ τοῦ πορευθῆναι ἔμπροσθεν αὐτοῦ τοῦ ζητῆσαι τὸν θεόν ὅτι κατέσπευσεν ἀπὸ προσώπου τῆς ῥομφαίας ἀγγέλου κυρίου

word.kjv: And the LORD sent an angel, which cut off all the mighty men of valour, and the leaders and captains in the camp of the king of Assyria. So he returned with shame of face to his own land. And when he was come into the house of his god, they that came forth of his own bowels slew him there with the sword.
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงใช้ทูตสวรรค์องค์หนึ่ง ซึ่งได้ตัดทแกล้วทหารทั้งปวงและผู้บังคับกองและนายทหารในค่ายของกษัตริย์แห่งอัสซีเรียออกเสีย เพราะฉะนั้นพระองค์จึงเสด็จกลับไปยังแผ่นดินของพระองค์ด้วยความอับอายขายพระพักตร์ และเมื่อพระองค์เสด็จเข้าในนิเวศแห่งพระของพระองค์ คนเหล่านั้นที่ออกมาจากบั้นเอวของพระองค์เองได้ฆ่าพระองค์ด้วยดาบเสียที่นั่น
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová envió un ángel, el cual hirió á todo valiente y esforzado, y á los jefes y capitanes en el campo del rey de Asiria. Volvióse por tanto con vergüenza de rostro á su tierra; y entrando en el templo de su dios, allí lo mataron á cuchillo los que hab
word.latinvulgate: Et misit Dominus angelum, qui percussit omnem virum robustum, et bellatorem, et principem exercitus regis Assyriorum : reversusque est cum ignominia in terram suam. Cumque ingressus esset domum dei sui, filii qui egressi fuerant de utero ejus interfecerunt eum gladio.
word.italian1927: E l’Eterno mandò un angelo che sterminò nel campo del re d’Assiria tutti gli uomini forti e valorosi, i principi ed i capi. E il re se ne tornò svergognato al suo paese. E come fu entrato nella casa del suo dio, i suoi propri figliuoli lo uccisero quivi di spada.
word.german1912: Und der HERR sandte einen Engel, der vertilgte alle Gewaltigen des Heeres und Fürsten und Obersten im Lager des Königs von Assyrien, daß er mit Schanden wieder in sein Land zog. Und da er in seines Gottes Haus ging, fällten ihn daselbst durchs Schwert, die von seinem eigenen Leib gekommen waren. {~} {~}
word.french1910: Alors l'Eternel envoya un ange, qui extermina dans le camp du roi d'Assyrie tous les vaillants hommes, les princes et les chefs. Et le roi confus retourna dans son pays. Il entra dans la maison de son dieu, et là ceux qui étaient sortis de ses entrailles le firent tomber par l'épée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華就差派一位使者，進入亞述王的軍營中，把所有英勇的戰士、官長和將帥，盡都消滅了。亞述王滿面羞愧返回本國去了。他進入自己的神廟的時候，他親生的兒子在那裡用刀把他殺了。
word.korean: 마레사 사람 도다와후의 아들 엘리에셀이 여호사밧을 향하여 예언하여 가로되 '왕이 아하시야와 교제하는고로 여호와께서 왕의 지은 것을 파하시리라' 하더니 이에 그 배가 파상하여 다시스로 가지 못하였더라
word.tagalog: At ang Panginoon ay nagsugo ng isang anghel, na naghiwalay ng lahat na makapangyarihang lalaking may tapang, at ng mga pangulo at mga pinunong kawal, sa kampamento ng hari sa Asiria. Sa gayo'y bumalik siya na nahihiya sa kaniyang sariling lupain. At nang siya'y dumating sa bahay ng kaniyang dios, ay pinatay siya roon ng tabak ng nagsilabas sa kaniyang sariling tiyan.
word.maori: Na ko te tukunga mai a Ihowa i te anahera, hautopea atu ana e ia nga toa marohirohi katoa ratou ko nga rangatira, ko nga tangata nunui, i te puni o te kingi o Ahiria. Heoi hoki ana ia ki tona whenua; whakama ana tona mata. Haere ana ia ki te wha re o tona atua, na patua iho ia i reira ki te hoari e te hunga i puta i ona whekau.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova nagpadala sa usa ka manolonda, nga miputol sa anang gamhanang mga tawo, sa kaisug ug sa mga pangulo ug mga capitan, diha sa campo sa hari sa Asiria. Busa siya mipauli uban sa nawong nga maulawon ngadto sa iyang kaugalingong yuta. Ug sa paghiabut niya sa balay sa iyang dios, sila nga sa kaliwatan da usab niya mingpatay kaniya didto pinaagi sa pinuti.
word.hebrew: כא וישלח יהוה מלאך ויכחד כל גבור חיל ונגיד ושר במחנה מלך אשור וישב בבשת פנים לארצו ויבא בית אלהיו ומיציאו (ומיציאי) מעיו שם הפילהו בחרב
word.hebrewmodern: וישלח יהוה מלאך ויכחד כל גבור חיל ונגיד ושר במחנה מלך אשור וישב בבשת פנים לארצו ויבא בית אלהיו ומיציאו מעיו שם הפילהו בחרב׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπέστειλεν κύριος ἄγγελον καὶ ἐξέτριψεν πᾶν δυνατὸν πολεμιστὴν καὶ ἄρχοντα καὶ στρατηγὸν ἐν τῇ παρεμβολῇ βασιλέως ασσουρ καὶ ἀπέστρεψεν μετὰ αἰσχύνης προσώπου εἰς τὴν γῆν αὐτοῦ καὶ ἦλθεν εἰς οἶκον τοῦ θεοῦ αὐτοῦ καὶ τῶν ἐξελθόντων ἐκ κοιλίας αὐτοῦ κατέβαλον αὐτὸν ἐν ῥομφαίᾳ

word.kjv: Behold, he put no trust in his servants; and his angels he charged with folly:
word.thailand: ดูเถิด แม้ผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์พระองค์ก็ไม่ทรงวางพระทัย และทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์พระองค์ทรงกล่าวโทษที่เขาโง่
word.spanish1909: He aquí que en sus siervos no confía, Y notó necedad en sus ángeles
word.latinvulgate: Ecce qui serviunt ei, non sunt stabiles, et in angelis suis reperit pravitatem ;
word.italian1927: Ecco, Iddio non si fida de’ suoi propri servi, e trova difetti nei suoi angeli;
word.german1912: Siehe, unter seinen Knechten ist keiner ohne Tadel, und seine Boten zeiht er der Torheit:
word.french1910: Si Dieu n'a pas confiance en ses serviteurs, S'il trouve de la folie chez ses anges,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的僕役他還不信任，他的天使他也指責過錯，
word.korean: 하나님은 그 종이라도 오히려 믿지 아니하시며 그 사자라도 미련하다 하시나니
word.tagalog: Narito, siya'y hindi naglalagak ng tiwala sa kaniyang mga lingkod; at inaari niyang mga mangmang ang kaniyang mga anghel:
word.maori: Nana, kahore rawa ia e whakawhirinaki ki ana pononga; a ki tana, he he kei ana anahera.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, siya wala magbaton ug pagsalig sa iyang mga alagad; Ug sa iyang mga manolonda siya nakatimaan ug kahungog:
word.hebrew: יח  הן בעבדיו לא יאמין    ובמלאכיו ישים תהלה
word.hebrewmodern: הן בעבדיו לא יאמין ובמלאכיו ישים תהלה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: εἰ κατὰ παίδων αὐτοῦ οὐ πιστεύει κατὰ δὲ ἀγγέλων αὐτοῦ σκολιόν τι ἐπενόησεν

word.kjv: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงทำให้เขาต่ำกว่าพวกทูตสวรรค์แต่หน่อยเดียว และทรงประทานสง่าราศีกับเกียรติเป็นมงกุฎให้แก่เขา
word.spanish1909: Pues le has hecho poco menor que los ángeles, Y coronástelo de gloria y de lustre.
word.latinvulgate: Quid est homo, quod memor es ejus ? aut filius hominis, quoniam visitas eum ?
word.italian1927: Eppure tu l’hai fatto poco minor di Dio, e l’hai coronato di gloria e d’onore.
word.german1912: Du hast ihn wenig niedriger gemacht denn Gott, und mit Ehre und Schmuck hast du ihn gekrönt.
word.french1910: Tu l'as fait de peu inférieur à Dieu, Et tu l'as couronné de gloire et de magnificence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你使他比天使（“天使”或譯：“　神”）低微一點，卻賜給他榮耀尊貴作冠冕。
word.korean: 저를 천사보다 조금 못하게 하시고 영화와 존귀로 관을 씌우셨나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't iyong ginawa siyang kaunting mababa lamang kay sa Dios, at pinaputungan mo siya ng kaluwalhatian at karangalan.
word.maori: Nohinohi nei te wahi i whakaititia iho ai ia e koe i te Atua, karaunatia ana ia e koe ki te kororia, ki te honore.
word.cebuano: Kay gibuhat mo siya nga ubos lamang ug diyutay kay sa mga manolonda, Ug gipurongpurongan mo siya uban sa himaya ug dungog.
word.hebrew: ה  מה-אנוש כי-תזכרנו    ובן-אדם כי תפקדנו
word.hebrewmodern: ותחסרהו מעט מאלהים וכבוד והדר תעטרהו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τί ἐστιν ἄνθρωπος ὅτι μιμνῄσκῃ αὐτοῦ ἢ υἱὸς ἀνθρώπου ὅτι ἐπισκέπτῃ αὐτόν

word.kjv: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
word.thailand: ทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ได้ตั้งค่ายล้อมบรรดาผู้ที่เกรงกลัวพระองค์ และช่วยเขาทั้งหลายให้รอด
word.spanish1909: El ángel de Jehová acampa en derredor de los que le temen, Y los defiende.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam gratis absconderunt mihi interitum laquei sui, supervacue exprobraverunt animam meam.
word.italian1927: L’Angelo dell’Eterno s’accampa intorno a quelli che lo temono, e li libera.
word.german1912: Der Engel des HERRN lagert sich um die her, so ihn fürchten, und hilft ihnen aus.
word.french1910: L'ange de l'Eternel campe autour de ceux qui le craignent, Et il les arrache au danger.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的使者，在敬畏他的人周圍紮營，搭救他們。
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 주를 경외하는 자를 둘러 진치고 저희를 건지시는도다
word.tagalog: Ang anghel ng Panginoon ay humahantong sa buong palibot ng nangatatakot sa kaniya, at ipinagsasanggalang sila.
word.maori: E noho ana te anahera a Ihowa i tetahi taha, i tetahi taha, o te hunga e wehi ana i a ia, a e whakaora ana i a ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang manolonda ni Jehova magapahaluna sa paglibut sa mga nangahadlok kaniya, Ug magaluwas kanila.
word.hebrew: ז  זה עני קרא ויהוה שמע    ומכל-צרותיו הושיעו
word.hebrewmodern: חנה מלאך יהוה סביב ליראיו ויחלצם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὅτι δωρεὰν ἔκρυψάν μοι διαφθορὰν παγίδος αὐτῶν μάτην ὠνείδισαν τὴν ψυχήν μου

word.kjv: Let them be as chaff before the wind: and let the angel of the LORD chase them.
word.thailand: ขอให้เขาเป็นเหมือนแกลบต่อหน้าลม และขอให้ทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ขับไล่ตามเขาไป
word.spanish1909: Sean como el tamo delante del viento; Y el ángel de Jehová los acose.
word.latinvulgate: Iniquitatem meditatus est in cubili suo ; astitit omni viæ non bonæ, malitiam autem non odivit.
word.italian1927: Sian come pula al vento e l’angelo dell’Eterno li scacci.
word.german1912: Sie müssen werden wie Spreu vor dem Winde, und der Engel des Herrn stoße sie weg.
word.french1910: Qu'ils soient comme la balle emportée par le vent, Et que l'ange de l'Eternel les chasse!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他們像風前的糠秕，有耶和華的使者驅逐他們。
word.korean: 저희로 바람 앞에 겨와 같게 하시고 여호와의 사자로 몰아내소서
word.tagalog: Maging gaya nawa sila ng ipa sa unahan ng hangin, at itaboy sila ng anghel ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Kia rite ratou ki te papapa e puhia ana e te hau; kia aia haeretia e te anahera a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Himoa silang ingon sa tahop sa atubangan sa hangin, Ug ang manolonda ni Jehova magaabog kanila .
word.hebrew: ה  יהיו כמץ לפני-רוח    ומלאך יהוה דוחה
word.hebrewmodern: יהיו כמץ לפני רוח ומלאך יהוה דוחה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀνομίαν διελογίσατο ἐπὶ τῆς κοίτης αὐτοῦ παρέστη πάσῃ ὁδῷ οὐκ ἀγαθῇ τῇ δὲ κακίᾳ οὐ προσώχθισεν

word.kjv: Let their way be dark and slippery: and let the angel of the LORD persecute them.
word.thailand: ขอให้ทางของเขามืดและลื่น และขอให้ทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ข่มเหงพวกเขา
word.spanish1909: Sea su camino oscuridad y resbaladeros; Y el ángel de Jehová los persiga.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, in cælo misericordia tua, et veritas tua usque ad nubes.
word.italian1927: Sia la via loro tenebrosa e sdrucciolevole, e l’insegua l’angelo dell’Eterno.
word.german1912: Ihr Weg müsse finster und schlüpfrig werden, und der Engel des HERRN verfolge sie.
word.french1910: Que leur route soit ténébreuse et glissante, Et que l'ange de l'Eternel les poursuive!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他們的路又暗又滑，有耶和華的使者追趕他們。
word.korean: 저희 길을 어둡고 미끄럽게 하시고 여호와의 사자로 저희를 따르게 하소서
word.tagalog: Maging madilim nawa, at madulas ang kanilang daan, at habulin sila ng anghel ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Kia pouri to ratou ara, kia pahekeheke: kia whaia ratou e te anahera a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Himoang mangitngit ug padangloga ang ilang dalan, Ug ang manolonda ni Jehova magagukod kanila.
word.hebrew: ו  יהי-דרכם חשך וחלקלקת    ומלאך יהוה רדפם
word.hebrewmodern: יהי דרכם חשך וחלקלקות ומלאך יהוה רדפם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: κύριε ἐν τῷ οὐρανῷ τὸ ἔλεός σου καὶ ἡ ἀλήθειά σου ἕως τῶν νεφελῶν

word.kjv: The chariots of God are twenty thousand, even thousands of angels: the Lord is among them, as in Sinai, in the holy place.
word.thailand: รถรบของพระเจ้าอเนกอนันต์ คือมีทูตสวรรค์นับเป็นพันๆ องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าทรงสถิตอยู่ท่ามกลางพวกเขา เหมือนในซีนาย คือในสถานบริสุทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Los carros de Dios son veinte mil, y más millares de ángeles. El Señor entre ellos, como en Sinaí, así en el santuario.
word.latinvulgate: Exaudi me, Domine, quoniam benigna est misericordia tua ; secundum multitudinem miserationum tuarum respice in me.
word.italian1927: I carri di Dio si contano a miriadi e miriadi, a migliaia di migliaia; il Signore viene dal Sinai nel santuario.
word.german1912: Der Wagen Gottes sind vieltausendmal tausend; der HERR ist unter ihnen am heiligen Sinai.
word.french1910: Les chars de l'Eternel se comptent par vingt mille, Par milliers et par milliers; Le Seigneur est au milieu d'eux, le Sinaï est dans le sanctuaire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神的車馬千千萬萬；主從西奈山來到他的聖所中（本句原文作“主在其中，西奈山在聖所中”）。
word.korean: 하나님의 병거가 천천이요 만만이라 주께서 그 중에 계심이 시내산 성소에 계심 같도다
word.tagalog: Ang mga karo ng Dios ay dalawang pung libo sa makatuwid baga'y libolibo: ang Panginoon ay nasa gitna nila, kung paano sa Sinai, gayon sa santuario.
word.maori: Ko nga hariata a te Atua, e rua tekau mano, mano mano iho; kei roto i a ratou te Ariki, me te mea ko Hinai, ko te wahi tapu.
word.cebuano: Ang mga carro sa Dios may kaluhaan ka libo, bisan linibo sa mga linibo: Ang Ginoo anaa sa taliwala nila, maingon didto sa Sinai, diha sa balaang puloy-anan.
word.hebrew: יז  למה תרצדון--    הרים גבננים ההר--חמד אלהים לשבתו    אף-יהוה ישכן לנצח
word.hebrewmodern: רכב אלהים רבתים אלפי שנאן אדני בם סיני בקדש׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: εἰσάκουσόν μου κύριε ὅτι χρηστὸν τὸ ἔλεός σου κατὰ τὸ πλῆθος τῶν οἰκτιρμῶν σου ἐπίβλεψον ἐπ' ἐμέ

word.kjv: Man did eat angels' food: he sent them meat to the full.
word.thailand: มนุษย์ได้กินอาหารของทูตสวรรค์ พระองค์ทรงประทานอาหารให้เขาอย่างอุดม
word.spanish1909: Pan de nobles comió el hombre: Envióles comida á hartura.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’uomo mangiò del pane dei potenti; egli mandò loro del cibo a sazietà.
word.german1912: Sie aßen Engelbrot; er sandte ihnen Speise die Fülle.
word.french1910: Ils mangèrent tous le pain des grands, Il leur envoya de la nourriture à satiété.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是人吃了天使的食物，是　神賜下的食糧，使他們飽足。
word.korean: 사람이 권세 있는 자의 떡을 먹음이여 하나님이 식물을 충족히 주셨도다
word.tagalog: Kumain ang tao ng tinapay ng makapangyarihan: pinadalhan niya sila ng pagkain hanggang sa nangabusog.
word.maori: Kai ana te tangata i ta te anahera kai: i tukua e ia he kai ma ratou, a makona noa.
word.cebuano: Ang tawo mikaon sa tinapay sa makagagahum: Siya nagpadala kanila ug kalan-on sa pagkabusog.
word.hebrew: כה  לחם אבירים אכל איש    צידה שלח להם לשבע
word.hebrewmodern: לחם אבירים אכל איש צידה שלח להם לשבע׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He cast upon them the fierceness of his anger, wrath, and indignation, and trouble, by sending evil angels among them.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงปล่อยความกริ้วดุร้ายของพระองค์มาเหนือเขา ทั้งพระพิโรธ ความกริ้วและความทุกข์ลำบาก โดยส่งเหล่าทูตสวรรค์ชั่วร้ายท่ามกลางเขา
word.spanish1909: Envió sobre ellos el furor de su saña, Ira y enojo y angustia, Con misión de malos ángeles.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Scatenò su loro l’ardore del suo cruccio, ira, indignazione e distretta, una torma di messaggeri di malanni.
word.german1912: da er böse Engel unter sie sandte in seinem grimmigen Zorn und ließ sie toben und wüten und Leid tun;
word.french1910: Il lança contre eux son ardente colère, La fureur, la rage et la détresse, Une troupe de messagers de malheur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他使猛烈的怒氣、忿怒、憤恨、患難，好像一群降災的使者，臨到他們中間。
word.korean: 그 맹렬한 노와 분과 분노와 고난 곧 벌하는 사자들을 저희에게 내려 보내셨으며
word.tagalog: Ibinugso niya sa kanila ang kabangisan ng kaniyang galit, poot at galit, at kabagabagan, pulutong ng mga anghel ng kasamaan.
word.maori: I tukua whakareretia e ia ki a ratou tona riri, aritarita, weriweri, me te raruraru; he whakaeke na nga anahera kino.
word.cebuano: Iyang gipadala sa ibabaw nila ang kabangis sa iyang kaligutgut, Kasuko, ug kapungot, ug kasamok, Usa ka panon sa mga manolonda nga dautan.
word.hebrew: מט  ישלח-בם חרון אפו--עברה וזעם וצרה    משלחת מלאכי רעים
word.hebrewmodern: ישלח בם חרון אפו עברה וזעם וצרה משלחת מלאכי רעים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์จะรับสั่งเหล่าทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์ในเรื่องท่าน ให้ระแวดระวังท่านในทางทั้งปวงของท่าน
word.spanish1909: Pues que á sus ángeles mandará acerca de ti, Que te guarden en todos tus caminos.
word.latinvulgate: Et exaltabitur sicut unicornis cornu meum, et senectus mea in misericordia uberi.
word.italian1927: Poiché egli comanderà ai suoi angeli di guardarti in tutte le tue vie.
word.german1912: Denn er hat seinen Engeln befohlen über dir, daß sie dich behüten auf allen deinen Wegen,
word.french1910: Car il ordonnera à ses anges De te garder dans toutes tes voies;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他為了你，會吩咐自己的使者，在你所行的一切路上保護你。
word.korean: 저가 너를 위하여 그 사자들을 명하사 네 모든 길에 너를 지키게 하심이라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't siya'y magbibilin sa kaniyang mga anghel tungkol sa iyo, upang ingatan ka sa lahat ng iyong mga lakad.
word.maori: Ka korerotia iho hoki koe e ia ki ana anahera kia tiakina koe i ou ara katoa.
word.cebuano: Kay siya magasugo sa iyang mga manolonda sa pagtan-aw kanimo, Sa pagbantay kanimo sa tanan mong mga dalan.
word.hebrew: יא  כי מלאכיו יצוה-לך    לשמרך בכל-דרכיך
word.hebrewmodern: כי מלאכיו יצוה לך לשמרך בכל דרכיך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ὑψωθήσεται ὡς μονοκέρωτος τὸ κέρας μου καὶ τὸ γῆράς μου ἐν ἐλαίῳ πίονι

word.kjv: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่ท่านทั้งหลาย ผู้เป็นทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์ จงถวายสาธุการแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ ท่านผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์ ผู้กระทำตามพระบัญชาของพระองค์ และเชื่อฟังเสียงพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Bendecid á Jehová, vosotros sus ángeles, Poderosos en fortaleza, que ejecutáis su palabra, Obedeciendo á la voz de su precepto.
word.latinvulgate: Posuisti tenebras, et facta est nox ; in ipsa pertransibunt omnes bestiæ silvæ ;
word.italian1927: Benedite l’Eterno, voi suoi angeli, potenti e forti, che fate ciò ch’egli dice, ubbidendo alla voce della sua parola!
word.german1912: Lobet den HERRN, ihr seine Engel, ihr starken Helden, die ihr seine Befehle ausrichtet, daß man höre auf die Stimme seines Wortes!
word.french1910: Bénissez l'Eternel, vous ses anges, Qui êtes puissants en force, et qui exécutez ses ordres, En obéissant à la voix de sa parole!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們作他天使的，就是那些大有能力，行他所吩咐，以及聽從他命令的，都要稱頌耶和華。
word.korean: 능력이 있어 여호와의 말씀을 이루며 그 말씀의 소리를 듣는 너희 천사여 여호와를 송축하라
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon, ninyong mga anghel niya: ninyong makapangyarihan sa kalakasan na gumaganap ng kaniyang salita, na nakikinig sa tinig ng kaniyang salita.
word.maori: Whakapaingia a Ihowa, e ana anahera, e hira nei te kaha, e whakarite nei i tana kupu, e whakarongo nei ki tona reo ina korero.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova, kamo nga mga manolonda niya, Nga mga gamhanan sa kalig-on nga nanagtuman sa iyang pulong, Nga nanagpatalinghug sa tingog sa iyang pulong.
word.hebrew: כ  ברכו יהוה    מלאכיו גברי כח עשי דברו    לשמע בקול דברו
word.hebrewmodern: ברכו יהוה מלאכיו גברי כח עשי דברו לשמע בקול דברו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἔθου σκότος καὶ ἐγένετο νύξ ἐν αὐτῇ διελεύσονται πάντα τὰ θηρία τοῦ δρυμοῦ

word.kjv: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:
word.thailand: ผู้ทรงบันดาลพวกทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์ให้เป็นดุจลม และทรงบันดาลผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ให้เป็นดุจเปลวเพลิง
word.spanish1909: El que hace á sus ángeles espíritus, Sus ministros al fuego flameante.
word.latinvulgate: Quærite Dominum, et confirmamini ; quærite faciem ejus semper.
word.italian1927: fa dei venti i suoi messaggeri, delle fiamme di fuoco i suoi ministri.
word.german1912: der du machst Winde zu deinen Engeln und zu deinen Dienern Feuerflammen;
word.french1910: Il fait des vents ses messagers, Des flammes de feu ses serviteurs.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你用風作你的使者，用火燄作你的僕役。
word.korean: 바람으로 자기 사자를 삼으시며 화염으로 자기 사역자를 삼으시며
word.tagalog: Na siyang gumagawa sa mga hangin na mga sugo niya; ang kaniyang mga tagapangasiwa ay alab ng apoy:
word.maori: E mea nei i nga hau hei karere mana, i te mura ahi hei kaimahi mana.
word.cebuano: Nga nagahimo sa kahanginan ingon nga mga sinugo; Mga siga sa kalayo maoy iyang mga alagad;
word.hebrew: ד  עשה מלאכיו רוחות    משרתיו אש להט
word.hebrewmodern: עשה מלאכיו רוחות משרתיו אש להט׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ζητήσατε τὸν κύριον καὶ κραταιώθητε ζητήσατε τὸ πρόσωπον αὐτοῦ διὰ παντός

word.kjv: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
word.thailand: ทูตสวรรค์ทั้งหลายของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ บรรดาพลโยธาของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alabadle, vosotros todos sus ángeles: Alabadle, vosotros todos sus ejércitos.
word.latinvulgate: Laudate eum, omnes angeli ejus ; laudate eum, omnes virtutes ejus.
word.italian1927: Lodatelo, voi tutti gli angeli suoi, lodatelo, voi tutti i suoi eserciti!
word.german1912: Lobet ihn, alle seine Engel; lobet ihn, all sein Heer!
word.french1910: Louez-le, vous tous ses anges! Louez-le, vous toutes ses armées!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的眾使者啊！你們要讚美他；他的眾軍啊！你們也要讚美他。
word.korean: 그의 모든 사자여 찬양하며 모든 군대여 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo siya, ninyong lahat niyang mga anghel: purihin ninyo siya, buo niyang hukbo.
word.maori: Whakamoemititia ia, e ana anahera katoa: whakamoemititia ia, e ana mano whaioio.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo siya, kamong tanang mga manolonda: Dayegon ninyo siya, kamong tanang mga panon niya.
word.hebrewmodern: הללוהו כל מלאכיו הללוהו כל צבאו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: αἰνεῖτε αὐτόν πάντες οἱ ἄγγελοι αὐτοῦ αἰνεῖτε αὐτόν πᾶσαι αἱ δυνάμεις αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Suffer not thy mouth to cause thy flesh to sin; neither say thou before the angel, that it was an error: wherefore should God be angry at thy voice, and destroy the work of thine hands?
word.thailand: อย่าให้ปากของเจ้าเป็นเหตุนำตัวเจ้าให้กระทำผิดไป และอย่าพูดต่อหน้าทูตสวรรค์ว่า นี่แหละเป็นความพลั้งเผลอ เหตุไฉนจะให้พระเจ้าทรงพิโรธเพราะเสียงพูดของเจ้า แล้วเลยทรงทำลายการงานแห่งน้ำมือของเจ้าเสียเล่า
word.spanish1909: No sueltes tu boca para hacer pecar á tu carne; ni digas delante del ángel, que fué ignorancia. ¿Por qué harás que Dios se aire á causa de tu voz, y que destruya la obra de tus manos?
word.latinvulgate: Ubi multa sunt somnia, plurimæ sunt vanitates, et sermones innumeri ; tu vero Deum time.
word.italian1927: Non permettere alla tua bocca di render colpevole la tua persona; e non dire davanti al messaggero di Dio: "E’ stato uno sbaglio." Perché Iddio s’adirerebbe egli per le tue parole, e distruggerebbe l’opera delle tue mani?
word.german1912: Laß deinem Mund nicht zu, daß er dein Fleisch verführe; und sprich vor dem Engel nicht: Es ist ein Versehen. Gott möchte erzürnen über deine Stimme und verderben alle Werke deiner Hände.
word.french1910: Ne permets pas à ta bouche de faire pécher ta chair, et ne dis pas en présence de l'envoyé que c'est une inadvertance. Pourquoi Dieu s'irriterait-il de tes paroles, et détruirait-il l'ouvrage de tes mains?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不可任你的口把自己陷於罪惡，也不可在使者前面說是許錯了。何必使　神因你的聲音發怒，破壞你手中的工作呢？
word.korean: 네 입으로 네 육체를 범죄케 말라 사자 앞에서 내가 서원한 것이 실수라고 말하지 말라 어찌 하나님으로 네 말소리를 진노하사 네 손으로 한 것을 멸하시게 하랴
word.tagalog: Huwag bayaan ang iyong bibig, na papagkasalanin ang iyong laman; at huwag ka mang magsabi sa harap ng anghel, na isang kamalian: bakit nga magagalit ang Dios sa iyong tinig, at sisirain ang gawa ng iyong mga kamay?
word.maori: Kei tukua e koe tou mangai kia mea hara mo ou kikokiko; kaua hoki e ki ki te aroaro o te anahera, he pohehe; kia riri te Atua ki tou reo hei aha, a he iho i a ia te mahi a ou ringa?
word.cebuano: Ayaw tugoti ang imong baba nga mahimong hinungdan sa pagpakasala sa imong unod; ni magsulti ka sa atubangan sa manulonda nga kadto usa man ka sayup: busa masuko ba ang Dios sa imong tingog, ug gub-on ba ang buhat sa imong mga kamot?
word.hebrew: ו כי ברב חלמות והבלים ודברים הרבה  כי את האלהים ירא
word.hebrewmodern: אל תתן את פיך לחטיא את בשרך ואל תאמר לפני המלאך כי שגגה היא למה יקצף האלהים על קולך וחבל את מעשה ידיך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὅτι ἐν πλήθει ἐνυπνίων καὶ ματαιότητες καὶ λόγοι πολλοί ὅτι σὺν τὸν θεὸν φοβοῦ

word.kjv: Then the angel of the LORD went forth, and smote in the camp of the Assyrians a hundred and fourscore and five thousand: and when they arose early in the morning, behold, they were all dead corpses.
word.thailand: ทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์จึงได้ออกไป และได้ประหารคนในค่ายแห่งคนอัสซีเรียเสียหนึ่งแสนแปดหมื่นห้าพันคน และเมื่อคนลุกขึ้นในเวลาเช้ามืด ดูเถิด พวกเหล่านั้นเป็นศพทั้งนั้น
word.spanish1909: Y salió el ángel de Jehová, é hirió ciento ochenta y cinco mil en el campo de los Asirios: y cuando se levantaron por la mañana, he aquí que todo era cuerpos de muertos.
word.latinvulgate: Egressus est autem angelus Domini, et percussit in castris Assyriorum centum octoginta quinque millia. Et surrexerunt mane, et ecce omnes cadavera mortuorum.
word.italian1927: E l’angelo dell’Eterno uscì e colpì, nel campo degli Assiri, cento ottantacinquemila uomini; e quando la gente si levò la mattina, ecco ch’eran tanti cadaveri.
word.german1912: Da fuhr aus der Engel des HERRN und schlug im assyrischen Lager hundertfünfundachtzigtausend Mann. Und da sie sich des Morgens früh aufmachten, siehe, da lag's alles eitel tote Leichname.
word.french1910: L'ange de l'Eternel sortit, et frappa dans le camp des Assyriens cent quatre-vingt-cinq mille hommes. Et quand on se leva le matin, voici, c'étaient tous des corps morts.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神懲罰亞述王（王下19:35~37；代下32:20~21）於是耶和華的使者出去，在亞述營中擊殺了十八萬五千人；到了早晨，有人起來，所見的都是死屍。
word.korean: 자기 신 니스록의 묘에서 경배할 때에 그 아들 아드람멜렉과 사레셀이 그를 칼로 죽이고 아라랏 땅으로 도망한고로 그 아들 에살핫돈이 이어 왕이 되니라
word.tagalog: At ang anghel ng Panginoon ay lumabas, at nanakit sa kampamento ng mga taga Asiria nang isang daan at walongpu't limang libo: at nang ang mga tao ay magsibangong maaga sa kinaumagahan, narito, ang lahat ay mga katawang bangkay.
word.maori: Na ka puta atu te anahera a Ihowa, a patua iho e ia i te puni o nga Ahiriana kotahi rau e waru tekau ma rima mano: a te marangatanga ake i te ata, nana, o ratou tinana! he tupapaku katoa ratou.
word.cebuano: Ug ang manolonda ni Jehova, migula ug gipamatay sa campo sa mga Asirianhon ang usa ka gatus ug kawaloan ug lima ka libo; ug sa pagbangon sa mga tawo sayo sa pagkabuntag, ania karon, kining tanan mga minatay.
word.hebrew: לו ויצא מלאך יהוה ויכה במחנה אשור מאה ושמנים וחמשה אלף וישכימו בבקר והנה כלם פגרים מתים
word.hebrewmodern: ויצא מלאך יהוה ויכה במחנה אשור מאה ושמנים וחמשה אלף וישכימו בבקר והנה כלם פגרים מתים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐξῆλθεν ἄγγελος κυρίου καὶ ἀνεῖλεν ἐκ τῆς παρεμβολῆς τῶν ἀσσυρίων ἑκατὸν ὀγδοήκοντα πέντε χιλιάδας καὶ ἐξαναστάντες τὸ πρωὶ εὗρον πάντα τὰ σώματα νεκρά

word.kjv: In all their affliction he was afflicted, and the angel of his presence saved them: in his love and in his pity he redeemed them; and he bare them, and carried them all the days of old.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงทุกข์พระทัยในความทุกข์ใจทั้งสิ้นของเขา และทูตสวรรค์ที่อยู่ต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์ช่วยเขาทั้งหลายให้รอด พระองค์ทรงไถ่เขาด้วยความรักของพระองค์ และด้วยความสงสารของพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงยกเขาขึ้นและหอบเขาไปตลอดกาลก่อน
word.spanish1909: En toda angustia de ellos él fué angustiado, y el ángel de su faz los salvó: en su amor y en su clemencia los redimió, y los trajo, y los levantó todos los días del siglo.
word.latinvulgate: In omni tribulatione eorum non est tribulatus, et angelus faciei ejus salvavit eos : in dilectione sua et in indulgentia sua ipse redemit eos, et portavit eos, et elevavit eos cunctis diebus sæculi.
word.italian1927: In tutte le loro distrette egli stesso fu in distretta, e l’angelo della sua faccia li salvò; nel suo amore e nella sua longanimità ei li redense; se li tolse in ispalla, e sempre li portò nei tempi andati;
word.german1912: Wer sie ängstete, der ängstete ihn auch; und der Engel seines Angesichts half ihnen. Er erlöste sie, darum daß er sie liebte und ihrer schonte. Er nahm sie auf und trug sie allezeit von alters her.
word.french1910: Dans toutes leurs détresses ils n'ont pas été sans secours, Et l'ange qui est devant sa face les a sauvés; Il les a lui-même rachetés, dans son amour et sa miséricorde, Et constamment il les a soutenus et portés, aux anciens jours.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他不再是敵對者，並且他面前的使者拯救了他們。他以自己的愛和憐憫救贖了他們；在古時的一切日子，他背負他們，懷抱他們。
word.korean: 그들의 모든 환난에 동참하사 자기 앞의 사자로 그들을 구원하시며 그 사랑과 그 긍휼로 그들을 구속하시고 옛적 모든 날에 그들을 드시며 안으셨으나
word.tagalog: Sa lahat nilang kadalamhatian ay nagdadalamhati siya, at iniligtas sila ng anghel na nasa kaniyang harapan: sa kaniyang pagibig at sa kaniyang pagkaawa ay tinubos niya sila; at kaniyang kinilik sila at kinalong silang lahat noong araw.
word.maori: I o ratou pouritanga ngakau katoa i pouri ano ia, a whakaorangia ake ratou e te anahera o tona aroaro; he aroha nona, he mahi tohu tangata i hoko ai ia i a ratou, hikitia ana ratou, whakahaereerea ana i nga ra katoa onamata.
word.cebuano: Sa tanan nilang mga kasakitan siya gisakit, ug giluwas sila sa manolonda sa iyang presencia: diha sa iyang gugma ug sa iyang kalooy, sila gitubos niya; ug sila gidala niya, ug iyang gisagakay sila sa tanang mga adlaw sa kanhing panahon.
word.hebrew: ט בכל צרתם לא (לו) צר ומלאך פניו הושיעם--באהבתו ובחמלתו הוא גאלם וינטלם וינשאם כל ימי עולם
word.hebrewmodern: בכל צרתם לא צר ומלאך פניו הושיעם באהבתו ובחמלתו הוא גאלם וינטלם וינשאם כל ימי עולם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐκ πάσης θλίψεως οὐ πρέσβυς οὐδὲ ἄγγελος ἀλλ' αὐτὸς κύριος ἔσωσεν αὐτοὺς διὰ τὸ ἀγαπᾶν αὐτοὺς καὶ φείδεσθαι αὐτῶν αὐτὸς ἐλυτρώσατο αὐτοὺς καὶ ἀνέλαβεν αὐτοὺς καὶ ὕψωσεν αὐτοὺς πάσας τὰς ἡμέρας τοῦ αἰῶνος

word.kjv: Then Nebuchadnezzar spake, and said, Blessed be the God of Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-nego, who hath sent his angel, and delivered his servants that trusted in him, and have changed the king's word, and yielded their bodies, that they might not serve nor worship any god, except their own God.
word.thailand: เนบูคัดเนสซาร์ตรัสว่า "สาธุการแด่พระเจ้าของชัดรัก เมชาค และเอเบดเนโก ผู้ได้ส่งทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์มาช่วยผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ให้พ้น ผู้วางใจในพระองค์ กระทำให้พระบัญชาของกษัตริย์เหลวไป และยอมพลีร่างกายของเขาเสียดีกว่าที่จะปรนนิบัติและนมัสการพระอื่น นอกจากพระเจ้าของเขาเอง
word.spanish1909: Nabucodonosor habló y dijo: Bendito el Dios de ellos, de Sadrach, Mesach, y Abed-nego, que envió su ángel, y libró sus siervos que esperaron en él, y el mandamiento del rey mudaron, y entregaron sus cuerpos antes que sirviesen ni adorasen otro dios que su
word.latinvulgate: Judicia enim vera fecisti juxta omnia, quæ induxisti super nos, et super civitatem sanctam patrum nostrorum Jerusalem : quia in veritate et in judicio induxisti omnia hæc propter peccata nostra.
word.italian1927: E Nebucadnetsar prese a dire: "Benedetto sia l’Iddio di Shadrac, di Meshac e di Abed-nego, il quale ha mandato il suo angelo, e ha liberato i suoi servi che hanno confidato in lui, hanno trasgredito l’ordine del re, e hanno esposto i loro corpi, per non servire e non adorare altro dio che il loro!
word.german1912: Da fing Nebukadnezar an und sprach: Gelobt sei der Gott Sadrachs, Mesachs und Abed-Negos, der seinen Engel gesandt und seine Knechte errettet hat, die ihm vertraut und des Königs Gebot nicht gehalten, sondern ihren Leib dargegeben haben, daß sie keinen Gott ehren noch anbeten wollten als allein ihren Gott!
word.french1910: Nebucadnetsar prit la parole et dit: Béni soit le Dieu de Schadrac, de Méschac et d'Abed-Nego, lequel a envoyé son ange et délivré ses serviteurs qui ont eu confiance en lui, et qui ont violé l'ordre du roi et livré leurs corps plutôt que de servir et d'adorer aucun autre dieu que leur Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 尼布甲尼撒說：“沙得拉、米煞、亞伯尼歌的　神是應當稱頌的，他差遣使者拯救那些倚靠他的僕人；他們違抗王的命令，寧願捨命，除了自己的　神以外，不肯事奉敬拜任何其他的神。
word.korean: 느부갓네살이 말하여 가로되 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고의 하나님을 찬송할지로다 그가 그 사자를 보내사 자기를 의뢰하고 그 몸을 버려서 왕의 명을 거역하고 그 하나님 밖에는 다른 신을 섬기지 아니하며 그에게 절하지 아니한 종들을 구원하셨도다
word.tagalog: Si Nabucodonosor ay nagsalita at nagsabi, Purihin ang Dios ni Sadrach, ni Mesach, at ni Abed-nego, na nagsugo ng kaniyang anghel, at nagligtas sa kaniyang mga lingkod na nagsitiwala sa kaniya, at binago ang salita ng hari, at ibinigay ang kanilang mga katawan, upang sila'y hindi maglingkod ni sumamba sa kanino mang dios, liban sa kanilang sariling Dios.
word.maori: ¶ Ka korero a Nepukaneha, ka mea, Kia whakapaingia te Atua o Hataraka, o Mehaka, o Apereneko, nana nei i unga mai tana anahera, a whakaorangia ana e ia ana pononga i whakawhirinaki nei ki a ia, i whakaputa ke nei i te kupu a te kingi, a tukua ana e ratou o ratou tinana, he mea kei mahi ratou, kei koropiko ki tetahi atu atua, engari ki to ratou Atua anake.
word.cebuano: Si Nabucodonosor misulti ug miingon: Bulahan ang Dios ni Sadrach, ni Mesach ug ni Abed-nego, nga nagpadala sa iyang manulonda, ug nagluwas sa iyang mga alagad nga mingsalig diha kaniya, ug ming-usab sa pulong sa hari, ug mingtugyan sa ilang mga lawas, aron sila dili makaalagad ug dili makasimba sa lain nga dios, gawas lamang sa ilang kaugalingon nga Dios.
word.hebrew: כח ענה נבוכדנצר ואמר בריך אלההון די שדרך מישך ועבד נגו די שלח מלאכה ושיזב לעבדוהי די התרחצו עלוהי ומלת מלכא שניו ויהבו גשמיהון (גשמהון) די לא יפלחון ולא יסגדון לכל אלה להן לאלההון
word.hebrewmodern: ענה נבוכדנצר ואמר בריך אלההון די שדרך מישך ועבד נגו די שלח מלאכה ושיזב לעבדוהי די התרחצו עלוהי ומלת מלכא שניו ויהבו גשמיהון די לא יפלחון ולא יסגדון לכל אלה להן לאלההון׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ κρίματα ἀληθείας ἐποίησας κατὰ πάντα ἃ ἐπήγαγες ἡμῖν καὶ ἐπὶ τὴν πόλιν σου τὴν ἁγίαν τὴν τῶν πατέρων ἡμῶν ιερουσαλημ διότι ἐν ἀληθείᾳ καὶ κρίσει ἐποίησας πάντα ταῦτα διὰ τὰς ἁμαρτίας ἡμῶν

word.kjv: My God hath sent his angel, and hath shut the lions' mouths, that they have not hurt me: forasmuch as before him innocency was found in me; and also before thee, O king, have I done no hurt.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ทรงใช้ทูตสวรรค์ของพระองค์มาปิดปากสิงโตไว้ มันมิได้ทำอันตรายแก่ข้าพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงเห็นว่าข้าพระองค์ไร้ความผิดต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์ ข้าแต่กษัตริย์ ข้าพระองค์มิได้กระทำผิดประการใดต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์ด้วย"
word.spanish1909: El Dios mío envió su ángel, el cual cerró la boca de los leones, para que no me hiciesen mal: porque delante de él se halló en mí justicia: y aun delante de ti, oh rey, yo no he hecho lo que no debiese.
word.latinvulgate: Deus meus misit angelum suum, et conclusit ora leonum, et non nocuerunt mihi : quia coram eo justitia inventa est in me : sed et coram te, rex, delictum non feci.
word.italian1927: Il mio Dio ha mandato il suo angelo e ha chiuso la bocca de’ leoni che non m’hanno fatto alcun male, perché io sono stato trovato innocente nel suo cospetto; e anche davanti a te, o re, non ho fatto alcun male".
word.german1912: Mein Gott hat seinen Engel gesandt, der den Löwen den Rachen zugehalten hat, daß sie mir kein Leid getan haben; denn vor ihm bin ich unschuldig erfunden; so habe ich auch wider dich, Herr König, nichts getan.
word.french1910: Mon Dieu a envoyé son ange et fermé la gueule des lions, qui ne m'ont fait aucun mal, parce que j'ai été trouvé innocent devant lui; et devant toi non plus, ô roi, je n'ai rien fait de mauvais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的　神差遣了他的使者，封住獅子的口，使牠們沒有傷害我，因為我在　神面前是清白的；王啊！在你面前我也沒有作過任何錯事。”
word.korean: 나의 하나님이 이미 그 천사를 보내어 사자들의 입을 봉하셨으므로 사자들이 나를 상해치 아니하였사오니 이는 나의 무죄함이 그 앞에 명백함이오며 또 왕이여 나는 왕의 앞에도 해를 끼치지 아니하였나이다
word.tagalog: Ang Dios ko'y nagsugo ng kaniyang anghel, at itinikom ang mga bibig ng mga leon, at hindi nila ako sinaktan; palibhasa'y sa harap niya ay nasumpungan akong walang sala; at gayon din sa harap mo, Oh hari, wala akong ginawang kasamaan.
word.maori: Kua tukua mai e toku Atua tana anahera, a tutakina ana e ia nga mangai o nga raiona, a kihai ratou i pa ki ahau: no te mea kua kitea toku kore hara i tona aroaro; kahore ano aku mahi he i tou aroaro, e te kingi.
word.cebuano: Ang akong Dios nagpadala sa iyang manulonda, ug gitak-uman ang baba sa mga leon, ug sila wala makadaut kanako; sanglit kay sa iyang atubangan nakita nga inocente man ako; ug ingon man usab sa atubangan mo. Oh hari, ako wala makapasipala.
word.hebrew: כב אדין דניאל עם מלכא מלל  מלכא לעלמין חיי
word.hebrewmodern: אלהי שלח מלאכה וסגר פם אריותא ולא חבלוני כל קבל די קדמוהי זכו השתכחת לי ואף קדמיך מלכא חבולה לא עבדת׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τότε δανιηλ ἐπήκουσε φωνῇ μεγάλῃ καὶ εἶπεν βασιλεῦ ἔτι εἰμὶ ζῶν

word.kjv: Yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed: he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him in Bethel, and there he spake with us;
word.thailand: เออ เขามีอำนาจเหนือทูตสวรรค์และมีชัย เขาร้องไห้และวิงวอนต่อพระองค์ เขาพบพระองค์ที่เบธเอล และพระองค์ตรัสสนทนากับเราที่นั่น
word.spanish1909: (H12-5) Venció al ángel, y prevaleció; lloró, y rogóle: en Beth-el le halló, y allí habló con nosotros.
word.latinvulgate: Et invaluit ad angelum, et confortatus est ; flevit, et rogavit eum. In Bethel invenit eum, et ibi locutus est nobiscum.
word.italian1927: (H12-5) lottò con l’angelo, e restò vincitore; egli pianse e lo supplicò. A Bethel lo trovò, e quivi egli parlò con noi.
word.german1912: (-) Er kämpfte mit dem Engel und siegte, denn er weinte und bat ihn; auch hat er ihn ja zu Beth-El gefunden, und daselbst hat er mit uns geredet.
word.french1910: Il lutta avec l'ange, et il fut vainqueur, Il pleura, et lui adressa des supplications. Jacob l'avait trouvé à Béthel, Et c'est là que Dieu nous a parlé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他與天使角力，並且得勝；他哀哭，向他求恩。他在伯特利遇見　神，　神在那裡對他說話。
word.korean: 천사와 힘을 겨루어 이기고 울며 그에게 간구하였으며 하나님은 벧엘에서 저를 만나셨고 거기서 우리에게 말씀하셨나니
word.tagalog: Oo, siya'y nagtaglay ng kapangyarihan sa anghel, at nanaig: siya'y tumangis, at namanhik sa kaniya: nasumpungan niya siya sa Beth-el, at doo'y nakipagsalitaan siya sa atin.
word.maori: Ae ra, i kaha ia ki te anahera, a taea ana e ia: i tangi ia, i inoi ki a ia: i tutaki ia ki a ia ki Peteere, a korero ana ia ki a tatou i reira;
word.cebuano: Oo, siya may gahum ibabaw sa manulonda, ug gibuntog niya ; siya mihilak, ug nangaliyupo kaniya: siya hipalgan niya didto sa Beth-el, ug didto siya nakigsulti kanamo,
word.hebrew: ד בבטן עקב את אחיו ובאונו שרה את אלהים
word.hebrewmodern: וישר אל מלאך ויכל בכה ויתחנן לו בית אל ימצאנו ושם ידבר עמנו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐν τῇ κοιλίᾳ ἐπτέρνισεν τὸν ἀδελφὸν αὐτοῦ καὶ ἐν κόποις αὐτοῦ ἐνίσχυσεν πρὸς θεὸν

word.kjv: Then said I, O my lord, what are these? And the angel that talked with me said unto me, I will shew thee what these be.
word.thailand: แล้วข้าพเจ้าจึงถามว่า `นายเจ้าข้า เหล่านี้คืออะไร' ทูตสวรรค์ที่สนทนากับข้าพเจ้าบอกข้าพเจ้าว่า `เราจะสำแดงให้เจ้าทราบว่า เหล่านี้คืออะไร'
word.spanish1909: Entonces dije: ¿Qué son éstos, señor mío? Y díjome el ángel que hablaba conmigo: Yo te enseñaré qué son éstos.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixi : Quid sunt isti, domine mi ? Et dixit ad me angelus qui loquebatur in me : Ego ostendam tibi quid sint hæc.
word.italian1927: E io dissi: "Che son questi, signor mio?" E l’angelo che parlava meco mi disse: "Io ti farò vedere che cosa son questi".
word.german1912: Und ich sprach: Mein HERR, wer sind diese? Und der Engel, der mit mir redete, sprach zu mir: Ich will dir zeigen, wer diese sind.
word.french1910: Je dis: Qui sont ces chevaux, mon seigneur? Et l'ange qui parlait avec moi me dit: Je te ferai voir qui sont ces chevaux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我就問：“我主啊，這些是甚麼？”那與我說話的天使對我說：“我會指示你這些是甚麼。”
word.korean: 내가 가로되 내 주여, 이들이 무엇이니이까 ? 내게 말하는 천사가 내게 이르되 이들이 무엇인지 내가 네게 보이리라 하매
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sinabi, Oh Panginoon ko, ano ang mga ito? At ang anghel na nakikipagusap sa akin ay nagsabi sa akin, Aking ipakikita sa iyo kung ano-ano ang mga ito.
word.maori: Na ka mea atu ahau, E toku ariki, he aha enei? A ka ki mai te anahera i korero ki ahau, Maku e whakaatu ki a koe te tikanga o enei.
word.cebuano: Unya miingon ako: Oh ginoo ko, unsa ba kini? Ug ang manulonda nga nakigsulti kanako miingon kanako: Ipakita ko kanimo kong unsa kini.
word.hebrew: ט ואמר מה אלה אדני ויאמר אלי המלאך הדבר בי אני אראך מה המה אלה
word.hebrewmodern: ואמר מה אלה אדני ויאמר אלי המלאך הדבר בי אני אראך מה המה אלה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπα τί οὗτοι κύριε καὶ εἶπεν πρός με ὁ ἄγγελος ὁ λαλῶν ἐν ἐμοί ἐγὼ δείξω σοι τί ἐστιν ταῦτα

word.kjv: And they answered the angel of the LORD that stood among the myrtle trees, and said, We have walked to and fro through the earth, and, behold, all the earth sitteth still, and is at rest.
word.thailand: และเขาเหล่านั้นได้ตอบทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ ผู้ยืนอยู่ท่ามกลางต้นน้ำมันเขียวว่า `เราได้ตรวจตราโลกแล้ว ดูเถิด ทั้งโลกก็นิ่งสงบอยู่'
word.spanish1909: Y ellos hablaron á aquel ángel de Jehová que estaba entre los mirtos, y dijeron: Hemos recorrido la tierra, y he aquí toda la tierra está reposada y quieta.
word.latinvulgate: Et responderunt angelo Domini, qui stabat inter myrteta, et dixerunt : Perambulavimus terram, et ecce omnis terra habitatur, et quiescit.
word.italian1927: E quelli si rivolsero all’angelo dell’Eterno che stava fra le piante di mortella, e dissero: "Noi abbiam percorso la terra, ed ecco tutta la terra è in riposo e tranquilla".
word.german1912: Sie aber antworteten dem Engel des HERRN, der unter den Myrten hielt, und sprachen: Wir haben die Erde durchzogen, und siehe, alle Länder sitzen still.
word.french1910: Et ils s'adressèrent à l'ange de l'Eternel, qui se tenait parmi les myrtes, et ils dirent: Nous avons parcouru la terre, et voici, toute la terre est en repos et tranquille.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那些騎士回報那站在石榴樹中間的耶和華使者，說：“我們已經在遍地巡邏；看見全地都安定，一片平靜。”
word.korean: 그들이 화석류나무 사이에 선 여호와의 사자에게 고하되 우리가 땅에 두루 다녀보니 온 땅이 평안하여 정온하더이다
word.tagalog: At sila'y nagsisagot sa anghel ng Panginoon na nakatayo sa mga puno ng mirto, at nagsabi, Aming nilibot ang lupa, at, narito, ang buong lupa ay tahimik, at tiwasay.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki ratou ki te anahera a Ihowa e tu ana i roto i nga ramarama, ka mea, Kua haereerea e matou te whenua, nana, kei te ata noho te whenua katoa, kei te marie.
word.cebuano: Ug sila mingtubag sa manulonda ni Jehova nga nagtindog sa taliwala sa mga kahoy nga mirto, ug ming-ingon: Kami minglakaw ngadto-nganhi latas sa kalibutan, ug, ania karon, ang tibook kalibutan nagaurong pa, ug nagapahulay,
word.hebrew: יא ויענו את מלאך יהוה העמד בין ההדסים ויאמרו התהלכנו בארץ והנה כל הארץ ישבת ושקטת
word.hebrewmodern: ויענו את מלאך יהוה העמד בין ההדסים ויאמרו התהלכנו בארץ והנה כל הארץ ישבת ושקטת׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπεκρίθησαν τῷ ἀγγέλῳ κυρίου τῷ ἐφεστῶτι ἀνὰ μέσον τῶν ὀρέων καὶ εἶπον περιωδεύκαμεν πᾶσαν τὴν γῆν καὶ ἰδοὺ πᾶσα ἡ γῆ κατοικεῖται καὶ ἡσυχάζει

word.kjv: Then the angel of the LORD answered and said, O LORD of hosts, how long wilt thou not have mercy on Jerusalem and on the cities of Judah, against which thou hast had indignation these threescore and ten years?
word.thailand: แล้วทูตสวรรค์ของพระเยโฮวาห์กล่าวว่า `ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์จอมโยธา อีกนานเท่าใดพระองค์จะไม่ทรงเมตตากรุงเยรูซาเล็ม และหัวเมืองแห่งยูดาห์ ซึ่งพระองค์ก็ทรงกริ้วมาเจ็ดสิบปีแล้ว พระเจ้าข้า'
word.spanish1909: Y respondió el ángel de Jehová, y dijo: Oh Jehová de los ejércitos, ¿hasta cuándo no tendrás piedad de Jerusalem, y de las ciudades de Judá, con las cuales has estado airado por espacio de setenta años?
word.latinvulgate: Et respondit angelus Domini, et dixit : Domine exercituum, usquequo tu non misereberis Jerusalem, et urbium Juda, quibus iratus es ? iste jam septuagesimus annus est.
word.italian1927: Allora l’angelo dell’Eterno prese a dire: "O Eterno degli eserciti, fino a quando non avrai tu pietà di Gerusalemme e delle città di Giuda, contro le quali sei stato indignato durante quei settant’anni?"
word.german1912: Da antwortete der Engel des HERRN und sprach: HERR Zebaoth, wie lange willst du denn dich nicht erbarmen über Jerusalem und über die Städte Juda's, über welche du zornig bist gewesen diese siebzig Jahre?
word.french1910: Alors l'ange de l'Eternel prit la parole et dit: Eternel des armées, jusques à quand n'auras-tu pas compassion de Jérusalem et des villes de Juda, contre lesquelles tu es irrité depuis soixante-dix ans?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是耶和華的使者說：“萬軍之耶和華啊！你不憐憫耶路撒冷和猶大的城鎮，要到幾時呢？這七十年來，你一直惱怒它們。”
word.korean: 여호와의 사자가 응하여 가로되 만군의 여호와여 여호와께서 언제까지 예루살렘과 유다 성읍들을 긍휼히 여기지 아니하시려나이까 ? 이를 노하신지 칠십년이 되었나이다 하매
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y ang anghel ng Panginoon ay sumagot at nagsabi, Oh Panginoon ng mga hukbo, hanggang kailan mawawalan ka ng habag sa Jerusalem at sa mga bayan ng Juda, laban sa iyong mga kinagalitan nitong pitong pung taon?
word.maori: Katahi ka oho te anahera a Ihowa, ka mea, E Ihowa o nga mano, kia pehea te roa ou ka kore nei e tohu i Hiruharama, i nga pa o Hura, e mauaharatia nei e koe i enei tau e whitu tekau?
word.cebuano: Unya ang manulonda ni Jehova mitubag ug miingon: Oh Jehova sa mga panon, hangtud anus-a nga ikaw dili malooy sa Jerusalem ug sa mga ciudad sa Juda, nga imong gikasilagan sulod niining kapitoan ka tuig?
word.hebrew: יב ויען מלאך יהוה ויאמר יהוה צבאות עד מתי אתה לא תרחם את ירושלם ואת ערי יהודה--אשר זעמתה זה שבעים שנה
word.hebrewmodern: ויען מלאך יהוה ויאמר יהוה צבאות עד מתי אתה לא תרחם את ירושלם ואת ערי יהודה אשר זעמתה זה שבעים שנה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπεκρίθη ὁ ἄγγελος κυρίου καὶ εἶπεν κύριε παντοκράτωρ ἕως τίνος οὐ μὴ ἐλεήσῃς τὴν ιερουσαλημ καὶ τὰς πόλεις ιουδα ἃς ὑπερεῖδες τοῦτο ἑβδομηκοστὸν ἔτος

word.kjv: And the LORD answered the angel that talked with me with good words and comfortable words.
